40025040	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩi jãiñaro, yʉ, Wiogʉ pea, o biro cʉ̃jare yʉ ĩirucu: “Yee méé mʉjare yʉ ĩi. Anija, yʉ yaarã boo pacoro ca biirãre mʉja ca tii nemorique, yʉrena tii nemorã mʉja tiiwʉ,” cʉ̃jare yʉ ĩirucu.
40025041	”To biro ĩi yapano, Wiogʉ pea, yʉ ãcõ nʉña ca niirã peera o biro cʉ̃jare yʉ ĩirucu: “Yʉre camotatiya, mʉja ñañaro ca biiparã, pecame ca ʉ̃ʉ yatitiri pecame, Satanás, cʉ̃ yaarã ca añutirã menare, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ cʉ̃jare cʉ̃ ca queno yuerica tabepʉ waarãja.
40025042	Yʉ ca queyaro, yʉre mʉja baarique ecatiwʉ. Yʉ ca oco jinirʉgaro, yʉre mʉja oco tĩatiwʉ.
40025043	Nucũ yujuri majʉ yʉ ca niiro, cãnirica tabe yʉre mʉja tiicojotiwʉ. Yʉ ca juti cʉotiro cãa, yʉre mʉja juti jãatiwʉ. Ñucã yʉ ca diaro, tia cũurica wiipʉ yʉ ca niiro cãare, yʉre mʉja ĩarã eatiwʉ,” yʉ ĩirucu.
40025044	”To biro yʉ ca ĩiro tʉo, o biro ĩi jãiñarucuma: “¡Wiogʉ! ¿Di tabe ʉno pee mʉ ca queyaro, mʉ ca jinirʉgaro, nucũ yujuri majʉ mʉ ca niiro, mʉ ca juti cʉotiro, mʉ ca diaro, tia cũurica wiipʉ mʉ ca niiro, mʉre jãa tii nemotiri? ¡To biro mʉ ca biiro jãa ĩatiwʉ!” ĩirucuma.
40025045	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, o biro cʉ̃jare yʉ ĩi yʉʉrucu: “Yee méé mʉjare yʉ ĩi: Anija, yʉ yaarã mena macãrã boo pacoro ca biirãre tii nemotirã, yʉ cãare tii nemotirã mʉja biiwʉ,” cʉ̃jare yʉ ĩirucu.
40025046	Cʉ̃ja pea to birora ñañaro cʉ̃ja ca biipa tabepʉ waarucuma. Añurã pea, to birora cʉ̃ja ca caticõa niipa tabepʉ waarucuma —ĩi wedewi Jesús.
40026001	Ate niipetirije ĩi yapano, o biro ĩiwi Jesús, jãa, cʉ̃ buerãre:
40026002	—Mee mʉja maji, pʉa rʉmʉ jiro Pascua boje rʉmʉ ca niirijere. Yʉ, Ca Nii Majuropeegʉ Macʉ̃re noni cõacãrucuma, yucʉ tenipʉ yʉre cʉ̃ja paa pua tuu cõajato ĩirã —ĩiwi.
40026003	Tii rʉmʉrirena, paia ʉparã, to biri judíos're ca jʉo niirã, paia wiogʉ Caifás yaa wiipʉ neari,
40026004	watoara jĩcã wãme ĩi dito buiyeeri Jesús're ñeeri cʉ̃ja ca jĩa cõapere ameri wede peniupa.
40026005	Biirãpʉa, “Boje rʉmʉ petira mani tiiticãjaco, bojoca ajiari uwiorije cʉ̃ja ca tiitipere biro ĩirã,” ameri ĩiupa.
40026006	Jesús, Betaniapʉre Simón ca cami boagʉ cʉ̃ja ca ĩigʉ yaa wiipʉ cʉ̃ ca niiro,
40026007	jĩcõ nomio ʉ̃tãga mena cʉ̃ja ca quenorica rʉacã dadaro ca jʉti añurije ca wapa pacarijere ca ami doorico jãa eawo. Jãa ea, Jesús baarique peorica pĩi pʉto cʉ̃ ca duwiro, ca jʉti añurijere cʉ̃ dʉpʉga jotoare pio peowo.
40026008	Jãa, cʉ̃ buerã pea, to biro cõ ca tiiro ĩari, ajiama ĩirã: —¡Níjá! ¿Ñee tiigo ca wapa pacarijere to biro peti cõ tii batecãti?
40026009	Ca boo pacarãre tii nemorʉgo wapa pacaro noni wapa jee bojapo cõa —jãa ameri ĩiwʉ.
40026010	Jesús pea to biro jãa ca ĩirijere majiri, o biro jãare ĩiwi: —¿Ñee tiirã atiore to biro mʉja ĩi pato wãcõti? Yʉ menare añurijere tiigo tiimo.
40026011	Ca boo pacarãra mʉja watoare to birora mʉja cʉocõa niirucu. Yʉ pee docare yoaro yʉre mʉja cʉotirucu.
40026012	Atio, ca jʉti añurijere yʉ upʉre pio peogo, yʉre cʉ̃ja ca yaa cõapepʉre queno yuego tiimo.
40026013	Yee méé mʉjare yʉ ĩi: Ati yepare noo ca niiri taberipʉ ate añurije quetire cʉ̃ja ca wederi taberipʉ, atio cõ ca tiirije cãare wederucuma. To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, cõ cãa majirico niirucumo —ĩiwi.
40026014	Jĩcʉ̃, jãa cʉ̃ buerã pʉa amo peti, dʉpore pʉaga penituaro ca niirã mena macʉ̃, Judas Iscariote ca wãme cʉtigʉ, paia ʉparãre ĩagʉ waari,
40026015	o biro cʉ̃jare ĩiupi: —Jesús're mʉjare yʉ ca tiicojojata, ¿no cõro yʉre mʉja wapa tiirãti? —ĩiupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, cʉ̃ja pea treinta tiiri, plata tiiri cʉ̃re wapa tiiupa Judas're.
40026016	To biro cʉ̃re cʉ̃ja ca tiiri tabera, Judas pea Jesús're cʉ̃ ca ñee doti majipa tabe ʉnore ama jʉo waaupi.
40026017	Pascua boje rʉmʉ ca nii jʉori rʉmʉre, pan ca wauarije ca ayiaya manirije baarica rʉmʉ ca earo, jãa cʉ̃ buerã pea cʉ̃ pʉto ea, o biro cʉ̃re jãa ĩi jãiñawʉ: —¿Noopʉ Pascua mani ca baapere jãa ca quenoro mʉ booti? —jãa ĩiwʉ.
40026018	To biro jãa ca ĩiro, o biro jãare ĩi yʉʉwi: —Jerusalén macãpʉ waari, jĩcʉ̃ yaa wiire eari, o biro cʉ̃re ĩiña: “Buegʉ o biro ĩimi: ‘Mee, yʉ yaa rʉmʉ cõñacã doo, to biri mʉ yaa wiipʉ yʉ buerã mena Pascua boje rʉmʉre yʉ ametʉenegʉ waarucu,’ ĩimi,” cʉ̃re mʉja ĩirucu —jãare ĩiwi Jesús.
40026019	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro jãa pea, Jesús cʉ̃ ca tii dotirore biro jãa tiiwʉ. To biri tii wiipʉ jãa queno yuewʉ, Pascua boje rʉmʉ jãa ca baapere.
40026020	Naiori tabe ca niiro, Jesús pea tii wiipʉ, jãa, pʉa amo peti, dʉpore pʉaga penituaro ca niirã cʉ̃ buerã mena baarique peorica pĩi pʉto bii duwiwi.
40026021	Jãa ca baa niiro ʉnora, o biro jãare ĩiwi Jesús: —Yee méé mʉjare yʉ ĩi: Jĩcʉ̃ mʉja mena macʉ̃ra yʉre wedejãa buiyee cõacãrucumi —ĩiwi.
40026022	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro jãa pea, bʉaro tʉgoeñarique pai, jãa ca niiro cõro o biro cʉ̃re jãa ĩi jãiñawʉ: —¿Wiogʉ, yʉra yʉ niicã tiimigʉti? —jãa ĩiwʉ.
40026023	To biro jãa ca ĩiro, o biro jãare ĩiwi Jesús: —Jĩcʉ̃, yʉ ca joari baparena cʉ̃ pan're ca weyogʉ niimi, yʉre ca wedejãapʉ.
40026024	Biigʉpʉa yʉ, Ca Nii Majuropeegʉ Macʉ̃a, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ wederiquere cʉ̃ja ca owarique ca ĩirore birora biigʉ doogʉ yʉ tii. Yʉre ca wedejãa buiyee cõagʉ pea, ñañaro peti biigʉ doogʉ tiimi. Cʉ̃ra, cʉ̃ ca baʉatijata, añucãbojapa —ĩiwi.
40026025	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩirora, Judas, Jesús're ca wedejãa buiyee cõapʉ pea, o biro cʉ̃re ĩi jãiñawi: —¡Buegʉ! ¿Yʉra yʉ niicãtimiti? —cʉ̃re ĩiwi. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro: —Mee, mʉra mʉ ĩi —cʉ̃re ĩi yʉʉwi Jesús.
40026026	Jãa ca baa niirora Jesús pea pan're ami, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉre: “Añu majuropeecã” ĩi yapano, pee bato, jãa cʉ̃ buerãre o biro jãare ĩi tiicojowi: —Amiri baaya. Atea yʉ upʉ nii —ĩiwi.
40026027	Jiro ñucã, ʉje oco bapare ami, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉre, “Añu majuropeecã” ĩi yapano, o biro ĩigʉra jãa peere noni cojowi: —Mʉja niipetirãpʉra ati bapare jiniña.
40026028	Atea yʉ díi nii, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ “Wãma wãme yʉ tiirucu,” cʉ̃ ca ĩiriquere cʉ̃ ca ĩiricarore biro to biijato ĩiro ca biirije, paʉ bojoca cʉ̃ja ca ñañarije wapare ametʉene bojagʉ yʉ ca bii yaipe.
40026029	O biro mʉjare yʉ ĩi: Ate ote ʉje ocore pʉati yʉ jini nemotirucu, mʉja mena yʉ Pacʉ cʉ̃ ca doti niiri tabepʉ wãma ʉje ocore yʉ ca jiniparo jʉguero —jãare ĩiwi Jesús.
40026030	Jiro, salmos baja yapano, Olivos buuropʉ jãa waacoawʉ.
40026031	Toopʉ o biro jãare ĩiwi Jesús: —Ati ñamire mʉja niipetirãpʉra yʉre mʉja waa weocoarucu. O biro ĩi owarique nii: “Oveja ca cotegʉre yʉ jĩa cõacãrucu. Cʉ̃ yaarã oveja pea no ca boorora waa batecoarucuma,” ĩi.
40026032	Biigʉpʉa, cati tuari jiro, mʉja jʉguero Galileapʉ yʉ waarucu —ĩiwi.
40026033	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, Pedro pea o biro cʉ̃re ĩi yʉʉwi: —Niipetirã mʉre cʉ̃ja ca waa weocoamijata cãare, yʉa mʉre yʉ waa weotirucu —cʉ̃re ĩiwi.
40026034	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, Jesús pea o biro cʉ̃re ĩiwi: —Yee méé mʉre yʉ ĩi: Ati ñamira ãbocʉ cʉ̃ ca wedeparo jʉguero, itiati peti, “¡Cʉ̃re yʉ majiti!” mʉ ĩi ditorucu —ĩiwi Pedrore.
40026035	Cʉ̃ pea o biro cʉ̃re ĩiwi: —Mʉ menara yʉ ca bii yaipe to ca niijata cãare, “¡Cʉ̃re yʉ majiti!” yʉ ĩi ditotirucu yʉa —ĩiwi Pedro. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, jãa Jesús buerã niipetirãpʉra to biro wado jãa ĩiwʉ.
40026036	Jiro Jesús jãa mena Getsemaní ca wãme cʉtiropʉ waa, toopʉ eagʉ, o biro jãare ĩiwi: —Õo pee waari yʉ ca juu buegʉ waaro ʉno, anora duwiya ména —ĩiwi.
40026037	To biro ĩi, Pedrore, Zebedeo puna pʉarãre, jʉo waawi. Too waagʉ, bʉaro tʉgoeñarique pai yaja pua bii jʉo waaupi Jesús.
40026038	To biri o biro cʉ̃jare ĩiupi: —Yʉ ca cati niirijepʉra bii yaicoaricarore biropʉ yʉ tʉgoeña yapa pua. Anora tuari, cãnitirãra yʉ menara ĩacã niiña —ĩiupi.
40026039	To biro ĩi yapano, cʉ̃ja jʉguero jañuro waa, yepapʉ muu bia cũmu waari, o biro ĩi juu bueupi: —¡Cáacʉ! Ametʉenerique ʉnora to ca niijata, ñañaro yʉ ca tamʉoro yʉre tiiticãña. Biigʉpʉa, yʉ ca boorore biro tiiticãña. Mʉ ca boorore biro pee to biijato —ĩiupi.
40026040	Juu bue yapano, cʉ̃ buerã pʉto pee tua waagʉ, ca cãnirãpʉre cʉ̃jare bʉa eari, o biro ĩiupi Jesús, Pedrore: —¿Jĩcã nimaro ʉno peera, cãnitirãra yʉ mena mʉja ĩa bayitijãri?
40026041	Cãnitirãra juu bueya, ñañarije ca bii buiyeerijere jãa tiire ĩirã. Añurijere mʉja tiirʉga tʉgoeña biirãpʉa, bʉari mʉja tʉgoeña bayiti majuropeecã —ĩiupi.
40026042	Waa, ñucã o biro ĩi juu bueupi Jesús: —¡Cáacʉ! Ano ñañaro yʉ ca biipere do biro tii camota majiña manirije to ca niijata, mʉ ca boori wãme tiiya —ĩiupi.
40026043	Juu bue yapano tua waagʉ, ca cãnirãpʉre bʉa eacãupi ñucã. Bʉaro ca wʉgoa eyoro macã, cʉ̃ja capegaari ĩa pãa bayiri méé bii niiupa.
40026044	To biro cʉ̃ja ca biiro ĩa, Jesús pea toora cʉ̃jare cũu, juu buegʉ waacoaupi ñucã. Cʉ̃ ca ĩiricarore birora ĩi juu bueupi.
40026045	To cõrora cʉ̃ buerã pʉto pee tua waa, o biro cʉ̃jare ĩiupi: —¿Ména to birora cãni, yerijãa, mʉja biicõa niiti? Mee, yʉ, Ca Nii Majuropeegʉ Macʉ̃re, ñañarije ca tiirãpʉre yʉre cʉ̃ja ca noni cõari tabe eacoa.
40026046	¡Wãmʉ nʉcãña! ¡Jamʉ! ¡Mee, ĩirã tʉja doomi, yʉre ca wedejãa buiyee cõagʉ! —ĩiupi Jesús.
40026047	Jesús to biro cʉ̃ ca ĩi niirora, Judas, jãa, Jesús buerã pʉa amo peti, dʉpore pʉaga penituaro mena macʉ̃ra, paʉ bojoca, jaderica pĩiri, yucʉ dʉcari, beju cʉticãri, paia ʉparã, to biri judíos're ca jʉo niirã cʉ̃ja ca tiicojoricarã mena bapa cʉti eawi.
40026048	Ména, wedejãari majʉ Judas pea, o biro cʉ̃jare ĩiupi Jesús're ca ñeeparãre: —Cʉ̃ wajopuare yʉ ca ũpũgʉ niirucumi. Cʉ̃re mʉja ñeerucu —ĩiupi.
40026049	To biri Judas, Jesús pʉto eagʉ: —¡Buegʉ mʉ niimite! —ĩiwi. To biro ĩigʉra, cʉ̃ wajopuare ũpũ, cʉ̃re tii añu doti eawi.
40026050	To biro cʉ̃ ca tiiro, Jesús pea o biro cʉ̃re ĩiwi: —Yʉ mena macʉ̃, mʉ ca tiirʉga dooriquere jĩcãto tiiya —ĩiwi. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩirora aperã pea doo, Jesús're cʉ̃re ñeewa.
40026051	To biro cʉ̃ja ca tiirora jĩcʉ̃ jãa mena macʉ̃, cʉ̃ niipĩi tʉ̃a wee amiri, paia wiogʉre pade coteri majʉ amoperore paa taa ñoocã cojowi.
40026052	To biro cʉ̃ ca tiiro, Jesús pea o biro cʉ̃re ĩiwi: —Mʉ niipĩire ca niiricaropʉra queno cũuña. Niipĩiri mena ca ameri quẽerã niipetirãpʉra, niipĩi menara jĩa ecorucuma.
40026053	Tii nemorique yʉ ca boojata, yʉ Pacʉre yʉ ca jãiro, “Mee, pʉa amo peti, dʉpore pʉaga penituaro ca niiri poogaari peti cʉ̃ pʉto macãrã uwamarãre tiicojo yerijãabocumi,” ¿mʉ ĩi majititi?
40026054	To biro to ca biijata, do biro pee biicãri Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ wederique: “To biro biirucu,” ¿cʉ̃ja ca ĩi owa cũuquĩrique cʉ̃ja ca ĩiricarore birora to biibogajati? —ĩiwi Jesús.
40026055	Ĩi yapano, o biro ĩi jãiñawi bojocare: —¿Ñee tiirã jee dutiri majʉre ca tiirãre biro niipĩiri, yucʉ dʉcari, jeecãricarã yʉre mʉja ñeerã doojãri? To cãnacã rʉmʉra Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yaa wiipʉ yʉ bue niirucujãwʉ. Jĩcãti ʉno peera yʉre ñee, mʉja tiitirucujãwʉ.
40026056	Biiropʉa, ate niipetirije Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yee quetire wede jʉgueri maja “O biro biirucu,” cʉ̃ja ca ĩi owaquĩricarore biro to biijato ĩiro bii —ĩiwi. To cõrora jãa, Jesús buerã pea, jãa niipetirãpʉra cʉ̃re jãa duti weocoawʉ.
40026057	Jesús're ca ñee waaricarã pea, paia wiogʉ Caifás yaa wii, doti cũuriquere ca jʉo buerã, judíos're ca jʉo niirã, cʉ̃ja ca nea poo niiropʉ cʉ̃re ami waaupa.
40026058	To biro cʉ̃ja ca tiiro, Pedro pea yoaropʉra cʉ̃jare nʉnʉ waa, paia wiogʉ yaa wii macã yepapʉ eacoaupi. Jãa waa, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yaa wii coteri maja uwamarã mena ea nuu waaupi, “¿Do biro peti Jesús're cʉ̃ja tii nʉnʉa waamirãti?” ĩi ĩarʉgʉ.
40026059	Paia ʉparã, ʉparã ca nii majuropeera niipetirã, Jesús're jĩa dotirʉgarã, watoara ĩi buiyeerica wãmeri ama niiupa.
40026060	To biro ĩi pacarã, watoara paʉ cʉ̃ja ca wedejãa niirije ca nii pacaro, jĩcã wãme ʉno peera bʉaticãupa. Biirique peti pʉarã,
40026061	o biro ca ĩirã eaupa: —Ania o biro ĩiwi: “Yʉa, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yaa wiire wee batecã, ñucã itia rʉmʉ jirora yʉ queno yapanocã maji,” ĩiwi —ĩi wedejãaupa.
40026062	To cõrora paia ʉpʉ pea wãmʉ nʉcã, o biro ĩiupi Jesús're: —¿Ñee tiigʉ mʉ yʉʉtiti? ¿Do biro ĩirʉgaro to ĩiti, ano o biirije mʉre cʉ̃ja ca ĩi wedejãarije? —ĩiupi.
40026063	Jesús pea wedetiupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca biiro, paia wiogʉ pea o biro cʉ̃re ĩiupi: —“Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ, to birora ca caticõa niigʉ wãme mena díámacʉ̃ jãare wedeya,” mʉre yʉ ĩi. ¿Díámacʉ̃ra mʉa, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ Macʉ̃ Mesías'ra mʉ niiti? —ĩiupi.
40026064	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, Jesús pea o biro cʉ̃re ĩi yʉʉupi: —Mee, mʉra mʉ ĩi: Yʉ, Ca Nii Majuropeegʉ Macʉ̃re, niipetirijepʉre Ca Doti Tutua Niigʉ cʉ̃ ca duwiro díámacʉ̃ nʉña pee ca duwigʉre, ñucã ʉmʉreco quejero maquẽ bueri bʉrʉripʉ yʉ ca dooro, mʉja niipetirã yʉre mʉja ĩarucu —ĩiupi.
40026065	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩirora, paia wiogʉ pea ajia ametʉacoama ĩigʉ, cʉ̃ jutirore tʉ̃a yega, o biro ĩiupi: —Ania, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉre ñañarije peti ii tuticãmi. Ñee peere ĩirã cõro ca wede nemoparãre paʉ jañuro mani ama nemotirucu. Mee, mʉjara ñañarije cʉ̃ ca ĩi tutirijere mʉja tʉo,
40026066	atere ¿do biro mʉja ĩi tʉgoeñati? —ĩiupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro: —Ñañarije cʉ̃ ca ĩi tutirije wapa, ca jĩa ecopʉra niimi —ĩi yʉʉupa.
40026067	To biro ĩirã, cʉ̃ diámacʉ̃re ʉjeco eo tuu, cʉ̃re ñoje, ñucã aperã cʉ̃re paa, tiirãra,
40026068	o biro cʉ̃re ĩiupa: —Mʉ, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ cʉ̃ ca tiicojoricʉ Mesías ca niigʉa ĩi bʉaya, ¿ñiru mʉre cʉ̃ paajãri? —ĩi epeupa.
40026069	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩi nii ditoye, Pedro pea macã yepapʉra cʉ̃ ca duwirucuro, jĩcõ pade coteri majo cʉ̃ pʉto eari, o biro cʉ̃re ĩiupo: —Mʉ cãa Galilea macʉ̃ Jesús menara mʉ waa yujurucujãwʉ —ĩiupo.
40026070	To biro cõ ca ĩiro, Pedro pea niipetirã cʉ̃ja ca tʉo cojoro, o biro ĩi ditoupi: —Yʉ majiti nija, ¿ñee ʉnore mʉ ĩiti? —ĩiupi.
40026071	Jiro jope pee cʉ̃ ca witi waaro, ñucã apeo pade coteri majo cʉ̃re ĩari, o biro ĩiupo, aperã to ca niirãre: —Ani cãa, Nazaret macʉ̃ Jesús menara niirucuwi —cʉ̃jare ĩiupo.
40026072	Cʉ̃ pea ñucã: —Yee méé yʉ ĩi nija. Yʉ majiti majuropeecã cʉ̃ra —ĩi ditoupi.
40026073	Ñucã jiro jañuroacã too ca niirã Pedro pʉto doori, o biro cʉ̃re ĩiupa: —Yee méé jãa ĩi. Mʉ cãa, cʉ̃ja mena macʉ̃ra mʉ nii. Mʉ ca wederijepʉra tʉo majiricarora Galilea macãrã cʉ̃ja ca wederijera mʉ wede —cʉ̃re ĩiupa.
40026074	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, cʉ̃ pea ñañarije cʉ̃jare ĩi tuti jañuripʉ: —Yee méé yʉ ĩi “Yʉ majiti,” mʉjare yʉ ĩijãwʉ —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩi niirora, ãbocʉ wedeupi.
40026075	To cõrora Pedro pea: “Ãbocʉ cʉ̃ ca wedeparo jʉguero, itiati peti ‘¡Cʉ̃re yʉ majiti!’ mʉ ĩi ditorucu,” Jesús cʉ̃re cʉ̃ ca ĩiriquere tʉgoeña bʉaupi. To cõrora Pedro too ca niiricʉ witi waa, bʉaro tʉgoeñarique pai añuro méé otiupi.
40027001	Ca boerije mena, paia ʉparã niipetirã, to biri judíos're ca jʉo niirã mena, Jesús're cʉ̃ja ca jĩa cõa dotipere ameri wede peni niiupa.
40027002	To biro ĩi, Jesús're jiacãri ami waari, wiogʉ romano Pilatopʉre cʉ̃re noniupa.
40027003	Judas, cʉ̃re ca wedejãa buiyee cõaricʉ pea, Jesús're jĩa cõacãrʉgarã cʉ̃ja ca tiirijere ĩa, “Ñañaro peti yʉ tiicãjapa,” ĩi tʉgoeñarique pai, treinta niirije plata tiirire, paia ʉparã, judíos're ca jʉo niirãre,
40027004	o biro ĩi tueneupi: —Ñañarije yʉ tiijapa, ñañarije ca tiitigʉrena wedejãa buiyee cõagʉ —cʉ̃jare ĩimiupi Judas. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, cʉ̃ja pea o biro cʉ̃re ĩi yʉʉcãupa: —¡Jãa teera “To biro biicu” jãa ĩiti! Mʉ yee wapa nii —ĩiupa.
40027005	To cõrora Judas pea, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yaa wiipʉra wapa tiirica tiirire dee bate cũu, witi waa, yucʉgʉpʉ mʉa waa, ca dʉpʉpʉ pũugʉ dʉpo jia tuuri, cʉ̃ majuropeera cʉ̃ amʉtuture jia tuu, bupu ñaañumu, biicã yai waaupi.
40027006	Paia ʉparã pea tee wapa tiirica tiirire jee, o biro ĩiupa: —Ate wapa tiirica tiiri, ca díi tujarije nii. Ʉmʉreco Pacʉre tiicojo nʉcʉ̃ bʉorã jãarica cũmuapʉre mani jãa majiti —ĩiupa.
40027007	To biro ĩi, ameri wede peni yapano, tee wapa tiirica tiiri mena jĩcã yepa, “Jotʉri Weeri Majʉ Yaa Yepa ca wãme cʉtiri yepare ca wapa tiipe niicu, ape yepa macãrãpʉ ca bii yairãre yaarʉgarã,” ĩiupa.
40027008	To biri tii yepa mecʉ̃ripʉ cãare, “Díi Yepa” wãme cʉti.
40027009	O biro bii eaupa, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yee quetire wede jʉgueri majʉ Jeremías: “Wapa tiirica tiiri plata, treinta niiri tiirire, israelitas, ‘To cõro wapa cʉtirucu,’ cʉ̃ja ca ĩiricaro cõro ca niirijere jeeri,
40027010	tee mena, ‘Jotʉri Weeri Majʉ Yaa Yepa ca wãme cʉtiri yepare wapa tiiwa,’ Ʉpʉ yʉre cʉ̃ ca tii dotiricarore birora,”  cʉ̃ ca ĩi owaquĩrique.
40027011	Jesús pea tii yepa macãrã ʉpʉ Pilato pʉtopʉ cʉ̃ ca nucũro, cʉ̃ pea o biro ĩi jãiñaupi Jesús're: —¿Mʉ, mʉ niiti, judíos Wiogʉ? —cʉ̃re ĩiupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro: —Mee, mʉra mʉ ĩi —cʉ̃re ĩi yʉʉupi Jesús.
40027012	Paia ʉparã, judíos're ca jʉo niirã, cʉ̃re cʉ̃ja ca wedejãamijata cãare, Jesús pea jĩcã wãme ʉnora cʉ̃jare yʉʉrucu, tiitiupi.
40027013	To biri Pilato pea o biro cʉ̃re ĩi jãiñaupi: —¿Ñañaro mʉre cʉ̃ja ca ĩi wedejãarijere mʉ tʉotiti? —ĩiupi.
40027014	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩimijata cãare, Jesús pea jĩcã wãme ʉnoacãra yʉʉrucu, tiitiupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca biiro Pilato pea, “Uwioro ca biigʉ cʉ̃ niiti ania,” cʉ̃re ĩi ĩaupi.
40027015	Ména, tii yepa macãrã ʉpʉ pea Pascua boje rʉmʉri ca niiro, jĩcʉ̃ tia cũurica wiipʉ ca niigʉ bojoca cʉ̃ja ca boogʉre wienerucuupi.
40027016	Tii tabere niiupi jĩcʉ̃ tia cũurica wiipʉre, Jesús Barrabás ca wãme cʉtigʉ, cʉ̃ja ca jãnoogʉ.
40027017	To biri Pilato pea too ca nea poo niirãre o biro ĩi jãiñaupi, Jesús're ĩa tutima ĩirã, cʉ̃ja ca wedejãa cõarijere majiri: —¿Niipere yʉ ca wienero mʉja booti, Jesús Barrabás peere, Jesús, Mesías mʉja ca ĩigʉ peere? —ĩiupi.
40027019	Ména, Pilato pea bojocare cʉ̃ ca jãiña bejeri tabepʉra cʉ̃ ca duwiro, cʉ̃ nʉmo pea o biro cʉ̃re ĩi cojoupo: —Mʉ menara ca ñañarije manigʉrena ñañaro cʉ̃re tiiticãña. Meepʉ macã ñamire ñañarije yʉ quẽñajãwʉ, cʉ̃ yee jʉori —ĩiupo.
40027020	Paia ʉparã, to biri judíos're ca jʉo niirã, Pilato pea Barrabás're wiene, Jesús peera jĩa cõa doti, cʉ̃ ca tiipere biro ĩirã, teere cʉ̃re cʉ̃ja jãijato ĩirã, bojocare wedejãa niiupa.
40027021	Tii yepa macãrã ʉpʉ pea cʉ̃jare jãiña nemoupi ñucã: —¿Anija pʉarãre, niipere yʉ ca wienero mʉja booti? —ĩiupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro: —¡Barrabás're mʉ ca wienero jãa boo! —ĩi yʉʉupa.
40027022	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, Pilato pea: —To docare Jesús, Mesías peera, ¿do biro yʉ tiigajati? —cʉ̃jare ĩi jãiñaupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, niipetirãpʉra: —¡Yucʉ tenipʉ cʉ̃re paa pua tuu cõacãña! —ĩiupa.
40027023	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, Pilato pea ñucã: —¿Ñee ʉno ñañarije cʉ̃ tiijapari? —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩimijata cãare: —¡Yucʉ tenipʉ cʉ̃re paa pua tuu cõacãña! —ĩi acaro bui nemoupa ñucã.
40027024	To biri Pilato pea cʉ̃ ca tiirʉgari wãme peere, “¡Do biro yʉ tiiricaro mani!” ĩima ĩigʉ, bʉaro jañuro bojoca cʉ̃ja ca acaro bui nʉnʉa waaro ĩari, oco jee doo dotiri, niipetirã cʉ̃ja ca ĩa cojoro o biro ĩigʉra amo coeupi: —Ani, ñañarije ca tiitiricʉrena mʉja ca jĩarijere, yʉa, yʉ wapa tuaticu. Mʉja yee nii —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi Pilato.
40027025	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, niipetirã bojoca o biro ĩi acaro buiupa: —¡Cʉ̃ ca bii yairije wapa, jãare, to biri jãa punare, to bii ñaapeajato! —ĩiupa.
40027026	To cõrora Pilato pea Barrabás're wiene, Jesús peera cʉ̃re bape doti yapano, cʉ̃jare nonicãupi, yucʉ tenipʉ cʉ̃re cʉ̃ja paa pua tuu cõajato ĩigʉ.
40027027	Tii yepa macãrã ʉpʉ yaarã uwamarã pea, ʉpʉ cʉ̃ ca niiri wiipʉ Jesús're ami waa, cʉ̃ wejare uwamarã niipetirãre jʉo neoupa.
40027028	To biro tii, cʉ̃re juti tuu weeri, ca jũari quejero pee cʉ̃re jãa,
40027029	cʉ̃ dʉpʉga peera pota daari mena juarica betore peo, cʉ̃ amo díámacʉ̃ peere yucʉgʉacã paa jua, tiicãri, cʉ̃ja ãjʉro jupeari mena cʉ̃ pʉto ea nuu waari, o biro cʉ̃re ĩi bui epeupa: —¡Judíos wiogʉ to birora cʉ̃ caticõa niijato! —ĩiupa.
40027030	Ñucã to biro ĩirãra, cʉ̃re ʉjeco eo tuu, yucʉgʉ cʉ̃re cʉ̃ja ca tiicojoricagʉrena amiri cʉ̃ dʉpʉgare paa, tiiupa.
40027031	Jesús're to biro ñañaro cʉ̃re tii epe yapano, cʉ̃re cʉ̃ja ca juti jãaricarore tuu wee, cʉ̃ juti majurope peere cʉ̃re jãa, cʉ̃re paa pua tuu cõarʉgarã amicoaupa.
40027032	Too ca niiricarã witi waarãra, jĩcʉ̃, Simón ca wãme cʉtigʉ, Cirene macã macʉ̃re bʉa eari, Jesús're cʉ̃ja ca paa pua tuu cõa paagʉre cʉ̃re ami waa nemo dotiwa.
40027033	Gólgota ca wãme cʉtiri tabe ea waarã, (“Dʉpʉga Õaro,” ĩirʉgaro ĩi),
40027034	ʉje oco ca jʉ̃guẽrije mena cʉ̃ja ca ayiariquere cʉ̃re tĩawa. Jesús pea teere jini ñaari jiro, jinirʉgatiwi.
40027035	Uwamarã pea Jesús're paa pua tuu nʉcõ yapanori jiro, ĩi bʉarique mena tiiri, cʉ̃ juti ca niiriquere ameri dica woowa.
40027036	To biro tii yapano, cʉ̃re ĩa coterʉgarã toora ea nuucoawa.
40027037	Ñucã cʉ̃ dʉpʉga jotoa peere, “Tee jʉori jĩa ecomi,” cʉ̃ja ca ĩi owa tuurica pĩire paa pua tuuwa. Tii pĩipʉre: ĩi owa tuurique tujawʉ.
40027038	Ñucã Jesús mena, jee dutiri maja pʉarã, jĩcʉ̃ cʉ̃ díámacʉ̃ nʉña pee, apĩ cʉ̃ ãcõ nʉña pee, paa pua tuu nʉcõ ecowa.
40027039	Bojoca too ca ametʉa waarucurã pea Jesús're ĩi tutirã, cʉ̃ja dʉpʉgare yureri, o biro cʉ̃re ĩi buiwa:
40027040	—Mʉ, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yaa wiire wee bate, itia rʉmʉ jirora wãma wii ca quenogʉa, mʉ majuropeera ametʉaya. ¡Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ Macʉ̃ra mʉ ca niijata, duwicã dooya! —ĩiwa.
40027041	Ñucã paia ʉparã, doti cũuriquere ca jʉo buerã, to biri judíos're ca jʉo niirã mena jĩcãri, to biiri wãmera cʉ̃re ĩi buiwa. O biro ĩiwa:
40027042	—Aperãpʉra mʉ ametʉene majicãwʉ biigʉpʉa. Mʉ majuropeera mʉ ca biirije peera mʉ ametʉene majiti. ¡Cʉ̃a, Israel yepa macãrã wiogʉ niimi, cʉ̃ duwicã doojato! To cõro docare díámacʉ̃ cʉ̃re mani tʉo nʉnʉjeerucu.
40027043	Cʉ̃a, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉre ca tʉo nʉnʉjeegʉ niimi. Mecʉ̃ docare Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ cʉ̃re cʉ̃ ametʉenejato, díámacʉ̃ra cʉ̃re cʉ̃ ca mai majuropeecãjata. Ania, “Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ Macʉ̃ yʉ nii,” ¿cʉ̃ ĩitiri? —cʉ̃re ĩi buiwa.
40027044	Ñucã jee dutiri maja, Jesús mena cʉ̃ja ca paa pua tuuricarã menapʉra, ñañarije cʉ̃re ĩi tutiwa.
40027045	Jotoa decomacã ca niiro, ati yepa niipetiropʉ ca naitĩa peticoarique, ñucã muipũ bʉaro cʉ̃ ca aji ñaacũmu duwi waari tabe ʉnopʉ boewʉ.
40027046	Tii tabera Jesús pea tutuaro mena o biro ĩi acaro buiwi: —Eloí, Eloí, ¿lama sabactani? (Yʉ Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ, yʉ Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ, ¿ñee tiigʉ yʉre mʉ waa weocoati?) —ĩigʉ ĩiwi.
40027047	Jĩcãrã too ca niirã to biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro tʉorã, o biro ameri ĩiwa: —Ania, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yee quetire wede jʉgueri majʉ Elías niiquĩricʉre jʉogʉ tiimi —ĩiwa.
40027048	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩirora, jĩcʉ̃ cʉ̃ja mena macʉ̃ ũmaa waa, upa jitia mena ʉje oco ca piyarijere joa amiri, yucʉgʉpʉ tii jitiare jia tuuri, cʉ̃re juu mʉene cojowi, “Cʉ̃ jinijato,” ĩigʉ.
40027049	To biro cʉ̃ ca tiiro, aperã pea o biro cʉ̃re ĩiwa: —Tiiticãña ména. Mani ĩaco, no cõro Elías cʉ̃re cʉ̃ ca ametʉenegʉ dooro —ĩiwa.
40027050	Ñucã, Jesús pea tutuaro mena acaro bui tʉja, bii yaicoawi.
40027051	To biro cʉ̃ ca biiri tabera Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yaa wii jupea macã jawire cʉ̃ja ca yoo camotaarica quejero, decomacã emʉaro pee yega taticã duwi waaupa. Ñucã ati yepa cãa bʉaro nana, ʉ̃tãgaari cãa wati batecoa,
40027052	maja operi pãacoa, paʉ bojoca ca ñañarije manirã ca bii yaiquĩricarã cati tua, biiupa.
40027053	Jesús cʉ̃ ca cati tuaro jiro, cʉ̃ja maja operipʉ ca niiricarã witi, ca ñañarije maniri macã Jerusalén'pʉ jãa waa, paʉ bojocare baua ĩño, biiupa. CN01843B.tif 
 Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yaa wiipʉre ca yojari quejero, decomacã yegacã duwi waaupa. Mt 27.51
40027054	Uwamarã ʉpʉ, to biri cʉ̃ ʉmʉa, Jesús're ca ĩa cote niiricarã, ati yepa ca nanarijere, ñucã niipetiro ca biirijere ĩarã, bʉaro uwirique mena: —¡Díámacʉ̃ra ania, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ Macʉ̃ peti niijapi! —ĩiwa.
40027055	Ñucã nomia paʉ romiri Jesús're ca tii nemoricarã Galilea yepapʉra ca nʉnʉ dooricarã romiri cãa, toora yoaropʉra ĩa cojocã niiwa.
40027056	Cʉ̃ja menare niiwa, María Magdalena, Santiago, José jãari paco María, apeo Zebedeo puna paco, niiwa.
40027057	Tii rʉmʉ naiori tabere eaupi jĩcʉ̃ ca apeye paigʉ, Arimatea macʉ̃ José ca wãme cʉtigʉ, cʉ̃ cãa, Jesús're ca tʉo nʉnʉjeegʉ ca niiricʉ.
40027058	To biri Pilato pʉtopʉ waari, Jesús upʉri niiquĩriquere yaa cõarʉgʉ, cʉ̃re jãiupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, Pilato pea Jesús upʉri niiquĩriquere cʉ̃re tiicojo dotiupi.
40027059	To biri José pea Jesús upʉri niiquĩriquere ami, ũmaarica quejero ca õweri maniri quejero mena cʉ̃re ũmaari,
40027060	maja ope, wãma ope ʉ̃tã tʉdipʉre cʉ̃ ca coa dotirica opepʉ cʉ̃re cũuupi. Jiro maja ope jãa waarica jopere ʉ̃tãgaaro mena tunuo biato, tuacoaupi.
40027061	María Magdalena, apeo María jãa pea, maja ope ãpõtĩñaarora ĩacã duwiupa.
40027062	Ape rʉmʉ, yerijãarica rʉmʉ maquẽre cʉ̃ja ca queno yueri rʉmʉ jiro macã rʉmʉre, paia ʉparã, to biri fariseos mena jĩcãri, Pilato pʉtopʉ waari,
40027063	o biro cʉ̃re ĩiupa: —Wiogʉ, õo ca niiquĩgʉ ca ĩi ditorique paigʉ niiquĩricʉ, ména catigʉpʉ, “Itia rʉmʉ jiro yʉ cati tuarucu,” cʉ̃ ca ĩiriquere jãa tʉgoeña bʉajãwʉ.
40027064	To biri mʉ ʉmʉare, cʉ̃ niiquĩricʉ maja opere itia rʉmʉ peti cʉ̃jare cote dotiya, cʉ̃ buerã waari, cʉ̃ upʉri niiquĩriquere ami duticãri, bojocare, “Mee, cati tuacoajãwi,” ĩi ditobocuma. To biro ca biijata docare yua, cʉ̃ ca ĩi dito jʉorique ametʉenero ĩi ditorique niibocu —ĩiupa.
40027065	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, Pilato pea o biro ĩiupi: —Mee, cʉ̃jara mʉja cʉo coteri maja uwamarãre. Cʉ̃ja mena waari, mʉja ca bayiro cõro maja opere coteya —ĩiupi.
40027066	To biri waa, maja opere añuro bia queno, ĩa majirʉgarã, cʉ̃ja ca biaricaga ʉ̃tãgare jʉgo ñee nemo, uwamarãre cote dotiupa. hk00197b.tif 
 Uwamarã romanos. Mt 27.66
40028001	Yerijãarica rʉmʉ jiro macã rʉmʉ ape semana ca nii jʉori rʉmʉ ca boe doori rʉmʉre, meepʉacã María Magdalena, to biri apeo María, maja opepʉ ĩarã waacoaupa.
40028002	Ca niiro tʉjarora, bʉaro yepa nanawʉ. Jĩcʉ̃ Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ pʉto macʉ̃, ʉmʉreco tutipʉ duwi doo, maja ope pʉto ea, tii opere cʉ̃ja ca biaricaga ʉ̃tãgare ami woo, tiiga jotoara ea nuucoaupi.
40028003	Cʉ̃ pea bʉpo cʉ̃ ca yaberijere biro ajiyaaupi. Cʉ̃ juti cãa oco weta ca botirore biro bʉaro botiupe.
40028004	Uwamarã pea cʉ̃re ĩarã uwima ĩirã, bʉaro nana, ca dia waaricarãre biro biicã cũmu waaupa.
40028005	Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ pʉto macʉ̃ pea o biro ĩiupi nomiare: —¡Uwiticãña! Yʉa, yucʉ tenipʉ cʉ̃ja ca paa pua tuucõajãgʉ Jesús're amarã mʉja ca biirijere yʉ maji.
40028006	Manimi anora. Mʉjare cʉ̃ ca ĩiricarore biro cati tuacoajãwi mee. Cʉ̃re cʉ̃ja ca cũurica tabere ĩarã doo ñaaqué.
40028007	Yoari méé waari, cʉ̃ buerãre: “Mee, ca bii yairicarã watoare cati tuacoajapi Jesús. Mʉja jʉguero Galileapʉ waami. Toopʉ cʉ̃re mʉja ĩarucu,” cʉ̃jare ĩi wede dooya. Mee, mʉjare yʉ wede yerijãa —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi.
40028008	To biri nomia pea yoari méé maja opepʉ ca niiricarã bʉaro uwi pacarã, ʉjea niirique mena ũmaa tua dooupa, jãa, Jesús buerãre wederã doorã.
40028009	To biro cʉ̃ja ca bii tua waari tabera, Jesús pea cʉ̃jare añu doti jãiña baua ea nʉcãupi. Cʉ̃ja romiri pea cʉ̃ pʉto waa, cʉ̃ dʉporire paabario, cʉ̃re ĩi nʉcʉ̃ bʉoupa.
40028010	Jesús pea o biro cʉ̃jare ĩiupi: —¡Uwiticãña! “Yʉ yee wederãre, Galileapʉ waarãja,” cʉ̃jare ĩi wederãja. Toopʉ yʉre ĩarucuma —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi Jesús.
40028011	Nomia cʉ̃ja ca tua nʉnʉa waaro ʉnora, jĩcãrã uwamarã maja opere ca cotericarã macãpʉ waari, cʉ̃jare ca biirique niipetiro wedeupa paia ʉparãre.
40028012	Paia ʉparã pea ñucã, judíos're ca jʉo niirã mena nea, wede peni yapanori jiro, uwamarãre pairo wapa tiirica tiiri tiicojori,
40028013	o biro cʉ̃jare ĩi wede majioupa: —Mʉja pea, “Ñami jãa ca cãni ditoye cʉ̃ buerã doori, Jesús upʉri niiquĩriquere ami duticãjapa,” ĩi wedeya.
40028014	Ñucã ati yepa macãrã ʉpʉ atere cʉ̃ ca maji bʉacãjata, jãa, mʉjare jãa wede bojarucu. To biro tiiri, teere mʉjare jãa ametʉenerucu —cʉ̃jare ĩiupa.
40028015	Uwamarã pea, wapa tiirica tiirire ñee, cʉ̃jare cʉ̃ja ca tii dotiricarore biro tiiupa. O biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiriquere, judíos watoare mecʉ̃ripʉ cãare to birora ĩicõa niima.
40028016	To biri jãa, Jesús buerã, pʉa amo peti, dʉpore jĩcãga penituaro ca niirã pea Galileapʉ, “Toopʉ yʉ niirucu,” Jesús jãare cʉ̃ ca ĩi wederica macãnʉcʉ̃ buuropʉ jãa waacoawʉ.
40028017	Jesús're ĩarã, cʉ̃re jãa ĩi nʉcʉ̃ bʉowʉ, ména, jĩcãrã “Cʉ̃ra niimi” cʉ̃ja ca ĩiti pacaro.
40028018	Jesús pea jãa pʉto pee doo, o biro jãare ĩiwi: —Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ, ʉmʉreco tutipʉ cãare, ñucã ati yepa cãare, yʉ ca doti niipere yʉre tiicojojãwi.
40028019	Tee tiirã waari, bojoca poogaari niipetirãpʉrena, yʉre ca tʉo nʉnʉjeerã cʉ̃ja ca niiro tiirãja. Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ wãme, cʉ̃ Macʉ̃ wãme, to biri Añuri Yeri wãme mena cʉ̃jare uwo coe,
40028020	ñucã mʉjare yʉ ca dotirique cõrorena tee ca ĩirore biro cʉ̃ja ca tii nʉnʉjeepere biro ĩirã cʉ̃jare wede majio, tiiya. Yʉ pea, to cãnacã rʉmʉra, ati yepa ca petiropʉ mʉja menara yʉ niicõa niirucu —ĩiwi Jesús. To biro to biijato. Mateo
41001001	Jesucristo, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ Macʉ̃ yee añurije queti ca nii jʉorije,
41001002	Isaías, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yeere wede jʉgueri majʉ, o biro cʉ̃ ca ĩi owaricarore biro biiupa: “Yʉ yee queti wederi majʉre, mʉ jʉguero yʉ tiicojo, mʉre cʉ̃ maa queno yuejato ĩigʉ.
41001003	Jĩcʉ̃, ca yucʉ maniri yepapʉ o biro ĩi acaro bui wederucumi: ‘Añuro tʉgoeñarique mena Wiogʉre yueya. Wiogʉ cʉ̃ ca eaparo jʉguerore, cʉ̃ ca doopa maare díámacʉ̃ maa cʉ̃ja ca queno yuerore birora, mʉja cãa mʉja yerire añuro cʉ̃re queno yueya.’ ”
41001004	Ate ca ĩirore biro Juan, ca yucʉ maniri yepapʉ uwo coe, ñañarije tiiriquere acobo ecorʉgarã, tʉgoeña yeri wajoari uwo coe dotirique maquẽre wede, bii eaupi.
41001005	Judea yepa macãrã niipetirã, Jerusalén macã macãrã, cʉ̃ ca wederijere tʉorã waarucuupa. Ñañarije cʉ̃ja ca tiiriquere wede ametʉene, cʉ̃ja ca tiiro Juan pea dia Jordán'pʉ cʉ̃jare uwo coeupi.
41001006	Juan juti pea camello poa mena tiirique nii, waibʉcʉ quejero daa wẽña, tiiupi. Cʉ̃ ca baarije pea yejeroa, macãnʉcʉ̃ macãrã dobea oco, niiupa.
41001007	O biro ĩi wedeupi Juan: “Yʉ jiro doomi jĩcʉ̃, yʉ ametʉenero do biro ca tiiya manigʉ. Cʉ̃ dʉpo juti jiarica daari ʉno cãare muu biari ca popio cotepʉ ʉno méé yʉ nii yʉa.
41001008	Yʉa, oco mena mʉjare yʉ uwo coe. Cʉ̃ pea Añuri Yeri mʉjapʉre cʉ̃ ca ñaajãa nʉcãro tiiri, mʉja ca tʉgoeña yeri wajoaro tiirucumi,” ĩiupi.
41001009	Tii rʉmʉrira Jesús, Galilea yepa macã macã Nazaret ca niiricʉ eaupi. Juan pea dia Jordán'pʉ cʉ̃re uwo coeupi.
41001010	Uwo coe eco yapano, maa nʉcãgʉra, ʉmʉreco tuti pãa nʉcãcoa, Añuri Yeri buare biigʉ bau duwi doo, cʉ̃pʉre cʉ̃ ca ñaapea earo ĩaupi.
41001011	Ñucã ʉmʉreco tutipʉ wederique o biro ca ĩi wedeorijere tʉoupi: “Mʉa, yʉ Macʉ̃, yʉ ca maigʉ mʉ nii. Mʉ mena bʉaro yʉ ʉjea nii,” ĩiupe. CN01656b.tif 
 Uwo Coeri majʉ Juan, Jesús're uwo coeupi. Mc 1.9
41001012	Ate jiro Añuri Yeri pea ca yucʉ maniri yepapʉ Jesús're amicoaupi.
41001013	Toopʉ cuarenta rʉmʉri peti, waibʉcʉrã ca uwiorã watoa bii niigʉ, Satanás're ñañarije tii doti eco niiupi Jesús. Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ pʉto macãrã pea cʉ̃re tii nemo niiupa.
41001014	Juan're tia cũurica wiipʉ cʉ̃ja ca tia cũuro jiro, Jesús Galilea yepapʉ Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yee añurije quetire wedegʉ waaupi.
41001015	O biro cʉ̃jare ĩi wedeupi: “Cʉ̃ ca cõorica cuu eacoa. Mee, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ cʉ̃ ca doti niirije eacoaro bii. Ñañarijere tʉgoeña yeri wajoa, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yee añurije quetipere tʉo nʉnʉjeeya,” ĩiupi.
41001016	Galilea ʉtabʉcʉra tʉjaro waa nʉnʉa waagʉ, Simón, cʉ̃ yee wedegʉ Andrés mena wai jĩari maja niiri, cʉ̃ja bapi yucʉ mena ca wai waja niirãre ĩaupi Jesús.
41001017	Cʉ̃jare ĩa: —Dooya yʉ mena. Yʉ pea waire mʉja ca waja bʉa majirore birora, bojocare ca waja bʉa majirã mʉja ca niiro mʉjare yʉ tiirucu —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi.
41001018	To cõrora cʉ̃ja pea jĩcãto cʉ̃ja bapi yucʉre cũu, cʉ̃ mena waacoaupa.
41001019	Ñucã too jʉgueroacãra ĩaupi Jesús, Zebedeo puna Santiago, cʉ̃ bai Juan, cũmuapʉ cʉ̃ja bapi yucʉre ca jia jãa queno niirãre.
41001020	Ñucã cʉ̃ja cãare jʉoupi Jesús. Cʉ̃ja pea, cʉ̃ja pacʉ Zebedeore, cʉ̃re ca pade nemori maja menara cũmuapʉra cʉ̃re cũu, waacoaupa.
41001021	Capernaúm'pʉ earã yerijãarica rʉmʉ ca niiro, nea poo juu buerica wiipʉ jãa waari, cʉ̃jare bue jʉo waaupi Jesús.
41001022	Doti cũuriquere ca jʉo buerãre biro méé, doti maji majuropeerique mena cʉ̃ ca buerijere tʉorã, bojoca pea do biro pee ĩiticãupa.
41001023	Tii macã macã wii nea poo juu buerica wiipʉre niiupi jĩcʉ̃ ca wãtĩa jãa ecoricʉ. O biro cʉ̃re ĩi acaro buiupi:
41001024	—Jesús, Nazaret macʉ̃, ¿ñee tiigʉ jãare mʉ pato wãcõgʉ dooti? ¿Ñañaro jãare tiigʉ doogʉ mʉ biijãri? Mʉre yʉ maji. Mʉa, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yʉʉ, ca ñañarije manigʉ mʉ nii —cʉ̃re ĩiupi.
41001025	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro Jesús pea: —¡Wedeticãña! To cõrora cʉ̃re camotatiya —cʉ̃re ĩi tuti cõa wieneupi.
41001026	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩirora, wãtĩ pea cʉ̃ ca yugui mecʉ̃ro cʉ̃re tii, tutuaro acaro bui, witicoaupi.
41001027	Teere niipetirãpʉra ĩa ʉcʉacoari, cʉ̃ja majurope o biro ameri ĩi jãiñaupa: —¿Ñee to niiti atea? Wãma wãme doti majirique mena bue, wãtĩapʉ cãare doticã, cʉ̃ ca dotirijere tʉo nʉnʉjee, biima —ĩiupa.
41001028	To biro Jesús cʉ̃ ca tiirique yoari méé Galilea yepa niipetiropʉre queti jeja nʉcãcoaupa.
41001029	Nea poo juu buerica wiipʉ ca niiricarã witi waarã, Santiago, Juan mena waaupi Jesús, Simón, Andrés jãa yaa wiipʉ.
41001030	Simón mañico pea bʉaro wiorique dia yojaupo. Teere Jesús're wedeupa.
41001031	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, cʉ̃ pea cõ pʉtopʉ waa, cõ amore ñeeri, cõre tʉ̃a wãmʉoupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca tiirora, jĩcãto wiorique yerijãacoaupa. Cõ pea cʉ̃jare jãi, baarique eca, tii waaupo.
41001032	Naiori tabe muipũ cʉ̃ ca ñaajãaro jiro, niipetirã ca diarique cʉtirãre, ca wãtĩa jãa ecoricarãre, Jesús pʉtopʉ jee waaupa.
41001033	Ñucã tii macã macãrã niipetirã Simón yaa wii jope pʉtore nea pooupa.
41001034	Jesús pea paʉ bojoca bojorica wãmeri ca diarique cʉtirãre catio, ñucã paʉ wãtĩare cõa wiene, tiiupi. Wãtĩa peera cʉ̃ja ca wedero bootiupi, cʉ̃re cʉ̃ja ca majiro macã.
41001035	Boeri tabe ca naitĩa jañuropʉra wãcã, waacoaupi Jesús, macã tʉjaro ca bojoca maniropʉ juu buegʉ waagʉ.
41001036	Jiro, Simón, cʉ̃ mena macãrã mena cʉ̃re amarã waa,
41001037	cʉ̃re bʉa earã, o biro cʉ̃re ĩiupa: —Niipetirã mʉre amarã tiima —ĩiupa.
41001038	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro Jesús pea o biro cʉ̃jare ĩi yʉʉupi: —Jamʉ. Ano pʉto jañuro ca niiri macãri pee mani waaco. Tii macãri macãrã cãare añurije queti cʉ̃jare yʉ ca wedepe nii. Teere ĩigʉra yʉ doowʉ —ĩiupi.
41001039	To biri Jesús, Galilea yepa niipetiropʉ nea poo juu buerica wiijeripʉ añurije quetire wede, bojocapʉre ca niirã wãtĩare cõa wiene, tii yujuupi.
41001040	Jĩcʉ̃ ca cami boa diarique cʉtigʉ Jesús pʉtopʉ ea, cʉ̃ pʉtopʉ cʉ̃ ãjʉro jupea mena ea nuuri: —Mʉ ca boojata, yʉ ca boarijere yʉre ametʉeneña —cʉ̃re ĩiupi.
41001041	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro cʉ̃re boo paca ĩari, cʉ̃ amo mena cʉ̃re ñia peo: —Mʉ yʉ ametʉenerucu, cami manigʉ tuaya —cʉ̃re ĩiupi Jesús.
41001042	To biro Jesús cʉ̃ ca ĩirora, cami yaticoa, añugʉ, ca cami manigʉ tuaupi.
41001043	Cʉ̃re catio yapano, o biro cʉ̃re ĩiupi Jesús:
41001044	—Tʉoya. Jĩcʉ̃ ʉno peerena wedeticãña. Waari, paire ĩño, añugʉ mʉ ca tuarije jʉori Moisés cʉ̃ ca tii dotirique jee waagʉja, paia cʉ̃ja ca majipere biro ĩigʉ —cʉ̃re ĩiupi.
41001045	Cʉ̃ pea waa, dʉjaricaro maniro ca biiriquere wedecãupi. Tee jʉori Jesús pea, jĩcã macã peerena bau niiro ea majitima ĩigʉ, macã tʉjaro ca bojoca maniropʉra tuacãrucuupi. To cʉ̃ ca bii pacaro, niipetiri taberi macãrã bojoca cʉ̃re ĩarã earucuupa.
41002001	Ñucã jĩcã rʉmʉri jiro Jesús Capernaúm'pʉ cʉ̃ ca earo, “Tii wii niijagʉ,” cʉ̃ja ca ĩirijere bojoca tʉo peticã cojoupa.
41002002	To cõrora paʉ, macã yepare noo pee nucũ majiña maniro dada nʉcãcoaupa. Cʉ̃ pea añurije quetire cʉ̃jare wedeupi.
41002003	Too cʉ̃ ca wede niiro bapari niirã, jĩcʉ̃ ca bʉʉricʉre cʉ̃re ami eaupa.
41002004	Paʉ bojoca cʉ̃ja ca niiro macã, Jesús pʉtopʉ cʉ̃re ami ea waa majitima ĩirã, wii jotoa pee mʉa waa, Jesús cʉ̃ ca nucũro jotoa jĩcã jope jee woori, ca bʉʉgʉre cʉ̃ ca yojari quejero menara cʉ̃re yoo duwio cojoupa.
41002005	Jesús pea, “Jesús cʉ̃re catiocãrucumi,” cʉ̃ja ca ĩi tʉgoeña bayirijere ĩari, o biro ĩiupi ca bʉʉgʉre: lb00305b.tif 
 Ca bʉʉricʉre cʉ̃ ca yojari quejero menara Jesús pʉto cʉ̃re yoo duwio cojoupa. Mc 2.4 —Macʉ̃, ñañarije mʉ ca tii bui cʉtirique acoboriquepʉ nii mee —cʉ̃re ĩiupi.
41002006	Jĩcãrã doti cũuriquere ca jʉo buerã too ca duwirã pea o biro ĩi tʉgoeñaupa:
41002007	“¿Ñee tiigʉ ania to biirije peti cʉ̃ ĩicãti? Ʉmʉreco Pacʉre ñañarije ĩi tutigʉ tiimi. Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ wado ñañarije tii bui cʉtiriquere acobo majimi,” ĩiupa.
41002008	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiri nimarora, Jesús pea to biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩi tʉgoeñarijere majiri, o biro cʉ̃jare ĩi jãiñaupi: —¿Ñee tiirã to biirije mʉja ĩi tʉgoeñati?
41002009	¿Di wãme pee to niiti popiye méé ca bʉʉricʉre ĩirica wãme: “Ñañarije mʉ ca tii bui cʉtirique acoboriquepʉ nii,” ĩirique, “Wãmʉ nʉcã, mʉ ca cũari quejerore ami waagʉja,” ĩirique pee?
41002010	Yʉ, Ca Nii Majuropeegʉ Macʉ̃ ati yepapʉre ñañarijere tii bui cʉtiriquere ca acobo majigʉ yʉ ca niirijere mʉja ca majipere biro ĩigʉ mʉjare yʉ ĩñorucu —ĩiupi Jesús. To biro ĩigʉra, ca bʉʉricʉre o biro cʉ̃ ĩiupi:
41002011	—Mʉre yʉ ĩi: ¡Wãmʉ nʉcãña! Mʉ ca cũaricarore ami, waagʉja mʉ yaa wiipʉ —cʉ̃re ĩiupi Jesús.
41002012	To cõrora cʉ̃ pea wãmʉ nʉcã, cʉ̃ ca cũarica quejerore ami, niipetirã cʉ̃ja ca ĩa cojoro witi, waacoaupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca biiro ĩarã, niipetirã ĩa ʉcʉacoari, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉre o biro ĩi nʉcʉ̃ bʉoupa: —Jĩcãti ʉno peera ate ʉnore mani ĩatiwʉ —ĩiupa.
41002013	Jiro waaupi ñucã Jesús ʉtabʉcʉra tʉjaropʉ. Paʉ bojoca cʉ̃re nea pooupa. To biro cʉ̃ja ca biiro cʉ̃ pea cʉ̃jare buecõa niiupi.
41002014	Too ametʉa waagʉ, Alfeo macʉ̃ Leví, Roma maquẽre wapa jee bojagʉ cʉ̃ ca duwiri tabepʉ ca duwigʉre ĩa, o biro cʉ̃re ĩiupi: “Yʉ mena dooya.” To biro cʉ̃re cʉ̃ ca ĩirora, Leví pea wãmʉ nʉcã, cʉ̃re nʉnʉcoaupi.
41002015	Jesús, Leví yaa wiipʉ cʉ̃ ca baa niiro, paʉ Roma maquẽre wapa jee bojari maja, “Ñañarije ca tiirã niima,” bojoca cʉ̃ja ca ĩi ĩarã, Jesús, cʉ̃ buerã menare baa bapa cʉti duwiupa. Cʉ̃re ca nʉnʉrã paʉ bojoca niiupa mee.
41002016	Cʉ̃ja mena cʉ̃ ca baa bapa cʉtiro ĩari, jĩcãrã doti cũuriquere ca jʉo buerã fariseos ca niirã, o biro ĩi jãiñaupa cʉ̃ buerãre: —¿Ñee tiigʉ mʉjare ca buegʉ pea Roma maquẽre wapa jee bojari maja mena, ñañarije ca tiirã mena, cʉ̃ baa bapa cʉti niiti? —ĩiupa.
41002017	Jesús pea teere tʉo, o biro cʉ̃jare ĩi yʉʉupi: —Ca diarique manirã ʉco tiiri majʉre amaatima. Ca diarique cʉtirã amaama. Yʉa, añurãre jʉogʉ doogʉ méé yʉ doowʉ. Ñañarã peere jʉogʉ doogʉ yʉ doowʉ —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi.
41002018	Jĩcãti Juan buerã, fariseos buerã, betiri juu buerã tiiupa. To biro cʉ̃ja ca tiiro ĩari, jĩcãrã Jesús pʉto waari, o biro ĩi jãiñaupa: —Juan buerã, fariseos buerã, betiri juu buema. Mʉ buerã pea ¿ñee tiirã cʉ̃ja betititi? —ĩiupa.
41002019	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, Jesús pea o biro cʉ̃jare ĩi yʉʉupi: —¿To docare, jĩcʉ̃ ca amo jiagʉ cʉ̃ ca jʉoricarã, cʉ̃ja mena cʉ̃ ca niirora cʉ̃ja beti cotebogajati? Ca amo jiagʉ cʉ̃ja mena cʉ̃ ca niirora beti majitima.
41002020	Biiropʉa niirucu jĩcã rʉmʉ, ca amo jiagʉre cʉ̃ja ca ami weo waari rʉmʉ. Tii rʉmʉ docare betirucuma.
41002021	”Jĩcʉ̃ ʉno peera jutiro bʉcʉrore wãma quejero mena sere tuu quenotimi. To biro tiijata, wãma quejero pee bʉcʉro peere tʉ̃a yega, pairi ope yega nemocoacu.
41002022	Ñucã ʉje oco wãma cãare, waibʉcʉ quejero poa, bʉcʉ poapʉ pio jãaña mani. Bʉcʉ poare ʉje oco wãmare pio jãajata, tii poare tii yegacãcu. To biri ʉje oco cãa pio batecoa, tii poa cãa yega yaicoa, biicu. To biro biire ĩirã, ʉje oco wãmare waibʉcʉ quejero poa wãma poapʉ ca pio jãape nii —cʉ̃jare ĩi wedeupi Jesús.
41002023	Jĩcã rʉmʉ, yerijãarica rʉmʉ ca niiro, Jesús ote wejerire cʉ̃ ca ametʉa waaro, cʉ̃ buerã pea to waa nʉnʉa waarã, ca dicare tune jee nʉnʉa waaupa.
41002024	To biro cʉ̃ja ca tiiro, fariseos pea o biro cʉ̃re ĩi jãiñaupa: —¡Ĩaña! ¿Ñee tiirã mʉ buerã pea, yerijãarica rʉmʉre ca tii dotitirijere cʉ̃ja tiiti? —ĩiupa.
41002025	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, Jesús pea o biro cʉ̃jare ĩiupi: —¿Jĩcãti ʉno peera mʉja bue ñaatiti, jĩcãti David cʉ̃ mena macãrã mena ñee jãa mani, queya, biima ĩirã cʉ̃ ca tiiriquere?
41002026	Abiatar, paia wiogʉ cʉ̃ ca niiri tabere David, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yaa wiipʉ jãa waa, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yee cʉ̃ja ca jee dica woorique pan, paia wadore cʉ̃ja ca baa dotimiriquerena baa, cʉ̃ mena macãrã cãare eca, tiiupi —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi.
41002027	O biro cʉ̃jare ĩi nemoupi ñucã: —Añuro mani ca niipere ĩigʉ, yerijãarica rʉmʉre cũuupi Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ. Yerijãarica rʉmʉ pee manire too dotijato ĩigʉ mee, yerijãarica rʉmʉre cũuupi.
41002028	To biri yʉ, Ca Nii Majuropeegʉ Macʉ̃, yerijãarica rʉmʉ cãare yʉ doti majicã —ĩi wedeupi Jesús.
41003001	Jiro, nea poo juu buerica wiipʉre jãa waaupi ñucã Jesús. Tii wiipʉre niiupi jĩcʉ̃, cʉ̃ amo ca bʉʉricʉ.
41003002	Jĩcãrã Jesús're ca wedejãarʉgarã, jĩcã wãme cʉ̃ ca tii bui cʉtirijere ca ama niirã, “¿Yerijãarica rʉmʉrena cʉ̃ catiocãgʉti?” ĩirã, cʉ̃re ĩa doe niiupa.
41003003	To cõrora Jesús pea o biro ĩiupi, ca amo bʉʉricʉre: —Wãmʉ nʉcã doori, decomacã pee ea nʉcãña —ĩiupi.
41003004	Aperã peera o biro cʉ̃jare ĩi jãiñaupi: —¿Yerijãarica rʉmʉre ñeere to tii dotiti, añurijere, ñañarije peere, bojocare catioriquere, jĩa cõarique peere? —ĩiupi. Cʉ̃ja pea wedetiupa.
41003005	Jesús pea, ajiarique mena cʉ̃ weja ca niirãre ĩa, cʉ̃ja ca tʉo nʉnʉjeerʉgatirijere bʉaro tʉgoeñarique pairi, o biro ĩiupi ca amo bʉʉricʉre: —Mʉ amore juu pooya —ĩiupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, cʉ̃ amo cʉ̃ ca juu poorora añuri amo biicoaupa.
41003006	Fariseos pea witicoarãpʉa, Herodes cʉ̃ ca ĩirijere ca tʉo nʉnʉjeerã mena nea poori, Jesús're cʉ̃ja ca jĩapere ameri wede peni jʉo waaupa.
41003007	Jesús, cʉ̃ buerã mena ʉtabʉcʉra tʉjaro cʉ̃ ca waaro, paʉ bojoca Galilea yepa macãrã cʉ̃jare nʉnʉ waaupa.
41003008	Niipetirije Jesús cʉ̃ ca tiirijere queti tʉori, paʉ bojoca, Judea macãrã, Jerusalén macãrã, Idumea macãrã, dia Jordán ape nʉña macãrã, Tiro, Sidón yepari macãrã Jesús're ĩarã dooupa.
41003009	To biirije cʉ̃ja ca biiro macã, Jesús pea, bojoca yʉre waa tuumicõabocuma ĩigʉ, cʉ̃ buerãre: “Petigaacã cũmua mʉja poo yuewa,” cʉ̃jare ĩiupi.
41003010	Paʉre cʉ̃ ca catioro macã, niipetirã ca diarique cʉtirã cʉ̃re padeñarʉgarã, tuu jua nʉnʉa dooupa.
41003011	Ñucã wãtĩa bojocapʉre ca niirã cãa, Jesús're ĩarãra, cʉ̃ jʉguero cʉ̃ja ãjʉro jupeari mena ea nuuri: —¡Mʉa, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ Macʉ̃ mʉ nii! —cʉ̃re ĩi acaro buirucuupa.
41003012	Jesús pea cʉ̃jare wede dotitiupi, cʉ̃ra cʉ̃ ca niirijere wede majiorema ĩigʉ.
41003013	Jiro Jesús ʉ̃tãgʉpʉ mʉa waa, cʉ̃ ca boorãre jʉoupi.
41003014	Cʉ̃ja pea cʉ̃ pʉto pee nea waaupa. Pʉa amo peti, dʉpore pʉaga penituaro ca niirã cʉ̃re bapa cʉti, añurije quetire wede doti cojo,
41003015	wãtĩare cõa wiene doti majirique cʉ̃jare ʉpo, cʉ̃ ca tiiparãre beje jeeupi.
41003016	Anija niiupa pʉa amo peti, dʉpore pʉaga penituaro niirã cʉ̃ ca beje jeericarã: Simón, ñucã cʉ̃rena Pedro cʉ̃ ca ĩiricʉ,
41003017	Zebedeo puna “Boanerges” cʉ̃ ca ĩiricarã, Santiago, cʉ̃ bai Juan, “Bʉpo Puna” ĩirʉgaro ĩi,
41003018	Andrés, Felipe, Bartolomé, Mateo, Tomás, Alfeo macʉ̃ Santiago, Tadeo, ñucã apĩ Simón celote bojocʉ,
41003019	apĩ Judas Iscariote jiro Jesús're ca wedejãa buiyee cõaricʉ, niiupa. CN01699B.tif 
 Cʉ̃ buerã ca niiparãre jʉoupi Jesús. Mc 3.13-19
41003020	Jiro Jesús wiipʉ cʉ̃ ca jãa waaro, paʉ bojoca neaupa ñucã, Jesús, cʉ̃ buerã, do biro tii cʉ̃ja ca baa majitiropʉ.
41003021	“Mecʉ̃cã yai waami Jesús,” cʉ̃ja ca ĩirijere tʉori, cʉ̃ yaarã pea cʉ̃re jʉorã waaupa.
41003022	Ñucã doti cũuriquere ca jʉo buerã Jerusalén'pʉ ca dooricarã cãa, o biro ĩiupa: “Beelzebú, wãtĩa wiogʉ majuropeera cʉ̃ ca yeri tutuarijere cʉ̃ ca tiicojoricʉ niiri, wãtĩare cõa wiene majimi,” ĩiupa Jesús're.
41003023	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, Jesús pea cʉ̃jare jʉo cojo, ĩi cõoñarique mena cʉ̃jare wedeupi: “¿Do biro tiigʉ Satanás cʉ̃ majuropeera cʉ̃ cõa wienebogajati?
41003024	Jĩcã yepa macãrãra cʉ̃ja majuropeera ameri camotati, cʉ̃ja ca ameri ĩa juna niijata, añuro nii yapano nʉcãticuma.
41003025	Jĩcã wii macãrãra ameri camotati, cʉ̃ja ca ameri ĩa juna niijata, añuro nii yapano nʉcãticuma.
41003026	Tii wãmere birora Satanás cãa cʉ̃ yaarãrena cʉ̃ ca ĩa junajata, añuro jʉo nii majiticumi. To cõrora yapano nʉcãgʉ biicumi.
41003027	Jĩcʉ̃ ʉno peera bojocʉ ca tutuagʉ yaa wiire jãa waari, cʉ̃re jia cũu jʉotigʉra cʉ̃ yee apeyere jee duti majiticumi. Cʉ̃re jia cũucã jʉoripʉ docare, cʉ̃ yee apeyere jee duti majibocumi.
41003028	Díámacʉ̃ mʉjare yʉ ĩi: Niipetirije ñañarije cʉ̃ja ca tiiriquere, ñañarije cʉ̃ja ca ĩirijere, acoborucumi Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ.
41003029	To ca bii pacaro, Añuri Yerire ñañarije ca ĩi tutigʉ doca, ñañarije cʉ̃ ca ĩi bui cʉtiriquere, jĩcãti ʉno peera coe ecotirucumi. To birora ñañaro cʉ̃ ca ĩi bui cʉtirique menara bii yai nʉcãcãrucumi,” ĩiupi.
41003030	“Ca wãtĩ jãa ecoricʉ niimi” cʉ̃re cʉ̃ja ca ĩirije jʉori, atere to biro cʉ̃jare ĩiupi Jesús.
41003031	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩi niiri tabera, Jesús paco, cʉ̃ bairã, eaupa. Macãpʉra tua nʉcãri, jĩcʉ̃re cʉ̃re jʉo dotirã tiicojo cojoupa.
41003032	Paʉ bojoca cʉ̃ weja ca duwirã pea o biro cʉ̃re ĩiupa: —Mʉ paco, mʉ bairã mʉre amama. Macãpʉ niima —ĩiupa.
41003033	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, o biro cʉ̃jare ĩi yʉʉupi: —¿Noa cʉ̃ja niiti, yʉ paco, yʉ bairã? —ĩiupi.
41003034	To biro ĩi, cʉ̃ weja ca duwi amojoderãre ĩa, o biro ĩiupi: —Anija niima yʉ paco, yʉ bairã, ca niirã.
41003035	No ca boorã Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ cʉ̃ ca boorijere ca tiirã niima, yʉ bai, yʉ baio, yʉ paco, ca niirã —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi Jesús.
41004001	Ñucã Jesús, ʉtabʉcʉra tʉjaropʉ bojocare bue jʉo waaupi. Bojoca cʉ̃ weja ca nea poorã paʉ cʉ̃ja ca niiro macã, Jesús pea cũmua tiira weja ca pajaricare ea jãa, ea nuu waaupi, bojoca pea ʉtabʉcʉra tʉjaro cʉ̃ja ca niiro ʉno.
41004002	To cõrora paʉ wãmeri ĩi cõoñarique mena cʉ̃jare wedeupi Jesús. O biro ĩiupi:
41004003	—Añuro tʉoya. Jĩcʉ̃ oteri majʉ cʉ̃ otere otegʉ waaupʉ.
41004004	Cʉ̃ ca otero, jĩcã apegaari maapʉ ñaaupe. Minia ea, teere baacãuparã.
41004005	Ape gaari ʉ̃tã watoa, ca jita mani jañuri tabere ñaaupe. Tee pea yoari mééra wiicoaupe, ʉje meniroacã jita niima ĩiro,
41004006	noo pee nʉcõri waa majiti, muipũ cʉ̃ ca aji mʉa doorora jinicã yai waaupe.
41004007	Ape gaari pota yucʉ watoapʉ ñaaupe. Ca dica manirora pota yucʉ pee teere wii biato yaiocãupe.
41004008	Ape gaari añuri jitapʉ ñaaupe. To biri añurije wii, bʉcʉa, añuro dica cʉtiupe, jĩcã jati treinta apegaari, ape jati sesenta niiricari, ape jati cien'gaari peti dica cʉtiupe —ĩi wedeupi. lb00094b.tif 
 Oteri majʉ. Mc 4.3-8
41004009	To biro ĩi, “Mʉja ca tʉo majirʉgajata, añuro yʉre tʉo nʉnʉjeeya,” cʉ̃jare ĩi nemoupi Jesús.
41004010	Jĩcʉ̃ra Jesús cʉ̃ ca tuaro, cʉ̃ pʉto ca niiricarã, cʉ̃ buerã pʉa amo peti, dʉpore pʉaga penituaro ca niirã mena, cʉ̃ ca ĩi cõoña wederiquere: “¿Do biro ĩirʉgaro to ĩiti?” cʉ̃re ĩi jãiñaupa.
41004011	O biro cʉ̃jare ĩiupi cʉ̃ pea: “Mʉjara, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ, cʉ̃ ca doti niiri tabe maquẽ, ca majiña manirijere mʉja ca majiro tiimi. Aperã peera ĩi cõoñarique mena wado cʉ̃jare wedemi.
41004012	”Ĩa pacarã, ĩa jeeñoti, tʉo pacarã, tʉo puoti, ñucã ñañarije cʉ̃ja ca tiirijere tʉgoeña yeri wajoa, cʉ̃ja ca biro Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ pea cʉ̃ja ca ñañarijere acobo, cʉ̃ ca tiitipere biro ĩigʉ,” cʉ̃jare ĩiupi Jesús.
41004013	O biro ĩi nʉnʉa waaupi: —¿Ate yʉ ca ĩi cõoñajãrijere mʉja tʉo puotiti? ¿Do biro pee tiicãri apeye peera mʉja tʉo puo majirãti?
41004014	Oteri majʉa añurije quetire wederi majʉ niimi.
41004015	Jĩcãrã, añurije quetire tʉorã maa pʉto oterica tabere biro ca biirã niima. Jiro Satanás doo, añuro cʉ̃ja yeripʉ cʉ̃ja ca tʉo ñeemiriquere cʉ̃jare ẽmacãmi.
41004016	Aperã, ca ʉ̃tã cʉtiri yepare otericarore biro ca biirã niima. Añurije quetire tʉorã, añuro ʉjea niirique mena tʉoma.
41004017	Paʉ nʉcõri manima ĩiro, añuro tutua añurije ca niitirore birora tʉgoeña bayitima. To biri añurije queti jʉori ñañaro cʉ̃jare ca bii earora, ñañaro cʉ̃jare cʉ̃ja ca tiirʉga nʉnʉjeerora, añurije quetire tʉo nʉnʉjee yerijãacãma.
41004018	Aperã, pota watoa oteriquere biro biima: Añurije quetire tʉoma,
41004019	tʉo pacarã, cʉ̃ja ca catiri rʉmʉrire cʉ̃ja ca cʉorʉga tʉgoeñarije, pairo apeye cʉtirʉgarique, niipetirije cʉorʉga tʉgoeñarique pee cʉ̃jare bii ametʉene, añurije queti cʉ̃ja ca tʉomiriquere, ca dica manirora ca wii bʉato yaioricarore biro teere tii yaiocã.
41004020	Aperã añuri jitapʉ oteriquere biro niima. Añurije quetire tʉo, nʉcʉ̃ bʉorique mena cʉ̃ja yeripʉ tʉo ñeema. Cʉ̃ja niima, jĩcã jati treinta, sesenta, cien ca dica cʉtiricarore biro ca biirã —cʉ̃jare ĩi wede majioupi Jesús.
41004021	Cʉ̃jare ĩiupi ñucã: —¿Jĩa boericagare upa cũmua docapʉ, cãni pejarica tabe doca pee, doporʉgarã ami doorique to niiti? ¡Biiticu! To ʉ̃ʉ boe pejajato ĩirã emʉaro pee peorique nii.
41004022	Teere birora yaioropʉ ca niirije majiña manirijera biicã yerijãa waa, ca biirije mani. Ñucã jĩcãrãra majirique cãa, niipetirãpʉ majiña manirijera niicã nʉnʉa waa, ca biirije mani. Yʉ wederique majiña manirora yai nʉcãcoa biitirucu.
41004023	Ca amoperi cʉtirã tʉoya yʉ ca ĩirijere —ĩiupi.
41004024	O biro cʉ̃jare ĩiupi ñucã: —Mʉja ca tʉorijere añuro tʉoya. Yʉ yee quetire aperãre mʉja ca wede majioro cõrora, mʉjare majiorucumi Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ. Bʉaro jañuro mʉja ca majiro tiirucumi.
41004025	Yʉ yee quetire aperãre ca wede majiogʉa, bʉaro jañuro majiriquere tiicojo ecorucumi. To biro ca tiitigʉa, petoacã cʉ̃ ca majirʉga tʉgoeñamirijeacã menapʉra ẽma ecocoarucumi —ĩiupi Jesús.
41004026	O biro cʉ̃jare ĩi wedeupi ñucã: —Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ cʉ̃ ca doti niiri tabea, jĩcʉ̃ otere yepapʉ cʉ̃ ca oterore biro nii.
41004027	Cʉ̃ ca cãniro, cʉ̃ ca cãnitijata cãare, ñami, ʉmʉreco, “To biro biicu,” cʉ̃ ca ĩi majiti pacaro, tee majuropeera wii, bʉcʉa mʉa, biicu.
41004028	Jita majuropeera ote ca bʉcʉaro tii, upaño bʉcʉa jʉo, oo yucʉ nʉcã, jiro dica cʉti, ca biiro tii.
41004029	Ca dica ca bʉcʉa yapanorãra, teere jeema, ca dica jeerica tabe ca earo macã —ĩi wedeupi Jesús.
41004030	O biro ĩiupi ñucã Jesús: —¿Ñee mena Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ cʉ̃ ca doti niirijere mani ĩi cõoñarãti? ¿Ñee ĩi cõoñarique mena, “To biirije bii” ĩi majirʉgarã mani ĩi cõoñabogajati?
41004031	Jĩcãga mostaza apega, ote ape niipetirije dʉaricaacã ca niiricare yepapʉ ote,
41004032	tiiricaro jiro bʉcʉa, niipetirije ote weje maquẽ ametʉenericʉ bii, paca dʉpʉri cʉti, tiigʉ dʉpʉri ca yʉjʉri taberire minia yerijãa peja, cʉ̃ja ca biirore biro bii —ĩiupi.
41004033	Paʉ wãmeri atere biirije ĩi cõoñari añurije quetire wedeupi Jesús, cʉ̃ja ca tʉo majiro cõro.
41004034	Ĩi cõoñarique manirora cʉ̃jare wede, tiitiupi. Biigʉpʉa, cʉ̃ buerã peera niipetirije cʉ̃jare wede majio peoticãrucuupi.
41004035	Tii rʉmʉ naiori tabere, cʉ̃ buerãre o biro ĩiupi Jesús: —Jamʉ, ʉtabʉcʉra ape nʉñapʉ mani tĩa waaco —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi.
41004036	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, bojocare waarique wui, Jesús cʉ̃ ca niiricagara ea jãa, tĩacoaupa. Too cʉ̃ja ca tĩa waaro, aperã cãa ape cũmuari mena cʉ̃jare bapa cʉti waaupa.
41004037	Too cʉ̃ja ca tĩa nʉnʉa waaro, tutuaro wino paa puuma ĩiro cũmuare pairo oco jabe jãaupe.
41004038	Jesús pea ména to biro ca biiparo jʉguero cũmua waa tuurica tua pee waa, juti poti mena cʉ̃ dʉpʉgare eo tuuri cãnicã jãa waaupi. Too ca cãni jãñagʉre wãcõri, o biro cʉ̃re ĩiupa cʉ̃ buerã pea: —¿Buegʉ, dua waarã mani ca biirijere “To biro biicu,” mʉ ĩiticãti? —ĩiupa.
41004039	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro Jesús pea wãmʉ nʉcã, winore, oco ca jaberijere, o biro ĩi yerijãa dotiupi: —Yerijãa waaroja. Jabe nemoticãña —ĩiupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩirora, jĩcãto añuropʉ yerijãa peticoaupe.
41004040	Jiro o biro ĩiupi Jesús cʉ̃ buerãre: —¿Ñee tiirã to cõro bʉaro mʉja uwiti? ¿“Manire ametʉenecãrucumi,” mʉja ĩi tʉgoeña bayiticãti ména? —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi.
41004041	Cʉ̃ja pea to biro cʉ̃ ca tiirijere ĩa ʉcʉa yaicoari, o biro ameri ĩi jãiñaupa: —¡Ayó nija! ¿Ñiru ʉno peti cʉ̃ niiti ania, wino, oco ca jaberijepʉ cãa cʉ̃ ca dotirore biro ca yʉʉ nʉnʉjee ecogʉa? —ĩiupa.
41005001	To biro bii, ʉtabʉcʉra ape nʉña Gerasa yepapʉre tĩa ea waaupa.
41005002	Jesús cʉ̃ ca maa nʉcãrije menara, jĩcʉ̃ ʉmʉ ca wãtĩ jãa ecoricʉ, maja operi watoapʉ ca niirucuricʉ eaupi.
41005003	Jĩcʉ̃ ʉno peera jiaricʉ méé, come daari mena cãare jiaricʉ ʉno méé niiupi.
41005004	Biirãpʉa paʉ tiiri come daari mena cʉ̃ dʉporire, cʉ̃ amorire cʉ̃ja ca jiamijata cãare, tʉ̃a jude batecãrucuupi, jĩcʉ̃ ʉno peera do biro cʉ̃ja ca tiitiropʉ.
41005005	Ʉmʉrecori, ñamiri, ʉ̃tãgʉʉripʉ, maja operi watoaripʉ cʉ̃ majuropeera ʉ̃tãgaaripʉ ñaatua, acaro bui, waa nucũ yujurucuupi.
41005006	To biri Jesús're yoaropʉra cʉ̃re ĩari, ũmaa doo, cʉ̃ ãjʉro jupeari mena cʉ̃ jʉguero ea nuuri,
41005007	o biro cʉ̃re ĩi acaro buiupi: —Jesús, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ ati ʉmʉreco niipetiropʉre Ca Doti Niigʉ Macʉ̃, yʉre pato wãcõticãña, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ mena mʉre yʉ ĩi, ñañaro yʉ ca tamʉoro yʉre tiiticãña —ĩiupi.
41005008	—To cõrora anipʉre witi waagʉja —Jesús cʉ̃ ca ĩiro macã, atere to biro ĩiupi.
41005009	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro: —¿Do biro mʉ wãme cʉtiti? —cʉ̃re ĩi jãiñaupi Jesús. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro cʉ̃ pea: —Paʉ jãa ca niirije niiri, Legión yʉ wãme cʉti —cʉ̃re ĩi yʉʉupi.
41005010	“Ape yepapʉ jãare tiicojo cõaticãña,” bʉaro ĩi jãiupa Jesús're.
41005011	Tii tabe jʉguero, ʉ̃tãgʉ pʉtore paʉ ecaricarã yejea baa niiupa.
41005012	Wãtĩa, bojocʉpʉre ca niirã pea: —Ĩijã, yejeapʉre jãare jãa dotiya —cʉ̃re ĩi jãiupa.
41005013	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, cʉ̃japʉre cʉ̃jare jãa dotiupi. To biri cʉ̃pʉre ca niiricarã witi waari, yejeapʉre jãaupa. Yejea dos mil peti ca niiricarã pea, wãtĩa cʉ̃japʉre cʉ̃ja ca jãarora ũmaa mecʉ̃ bua waa, ʉtabʉcʉrapʉ ñaañua, dua peticoaupa.
41005014	To biro cʉ̃ja ca biiro ĩarã, yejeare ca cote niiricarã pea yoari méé ũmaa tua waari, macã macãrãre, ñucã macã tʉjaro macãrãre, to biro ca biiriquere cʉ̃jare wederã waaupa. Bojoca pea teere tʉorã, to biro ca biiriquere ĩarã waaupa.
41005015	Jesús cʉ̃ ca niiropʉ earã, paʉ wãtĩa ca jãa ecomiricʉre juti jãñacãri, añuro tʉgoeña bojoca catigʉpʉ cʉ̃ ca duwiro ĩari, bʉaro uwiupa.
41005016	Ca wãtĩa jãa ecomiricʉ cʉ̃ ca biiriquere, yejea cʉ̃ja ca biiriquere ca ĩaricarã pea, “O biro biijãwʉ,” cʉ̃jare ĩi wedeupa.
41005017	Teere tʉori, “Aperopʉ waacoagʉja. Jãa ca niiri tabere niiticãña,” cʉ̃re ĩiupa Jesús're.
41005018	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro Jesús waagʉ, cʉ̃ ca bua jãarora, paʉ wãtĩa cʉ̃ja ca jãñagʉre cʉ̃ ca catioricʉ pea, cʉ̃ mena waarʉgʉ cʉ̃re jãimiupi.
41005019	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro Jesús pea: —Mʉ yaarã pʉto pee tua waari, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ mʉre cʉ̃ ca tiirique niipetirijere, mʉre cʉ̃ ca ĩa boo pacariquere, wede peoticãña mʉ yaarãre —cʉ̃re boca ĩicãupi.
41005020	To biro Jesús cʉ̃re cʉ̃ ca ĩiro tua waa, Decápolis yepare ca niiri macãri macãrãre niipetirije Jesús cʉ̃re cʉ̃ ca tiiriquere wedeupi. Teere tʉorã, niipetirã bojoca do biro pee ĩi majiticãupa.
41005021	Jesús ʉtabʉcʉra ape nʉñapʉ ca niiricʉ cʉ̃ ca tua tĩa earo jiro, paʉ bojoca cʉ̃re nea pooupa. Cʉ̃ pea tiira tʉjaropʉra tua nʉcãupi.
41005022	Tii tabere jĩcʉ̃ nea poo juu buerica wii wiogʉ, Jairo ca wãme cʉtigʉ eaupi. Jesús're ĩari, cʉ̃ pʉto cʉ̃ ãjʉro jupeari mena ea nuu waa:
41005023	—Yʉ macõacã dia waagopʉ tiijãwo. Doori, mʉ amo mena cõre ñia peogʉ dooya, diarique ametʉa, cati, cõ biijato ĩigʉ —bʉaro cʉ̃re ĩiupi.
41005024	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro Jesús, Jairo mena cʉ̃ ca waa nʉnʉa waaro, paʉ bojoca cʉ̃re bapa cʉti waarã, ʉta bijaroacã ameri tuutu nʉnʉa waaupa.
41005025	Cʉ̃ja patoacã watoare niiupo jĩcõ nomio, pʉa amo peti, dʉpore pʉaga penituaro niiri cʉ̃mari peti ca díi tatitirije ca diarique cʉti niigo.
41005026	Paʉ ʉco tiiri majare ʉco tii doti, wapa tiima ĩigo, cõ ca cʉomiriquere noni peoticãupo. To biro tii pacago ametʉaricaro maniro, bʉaro jañuro ñañaro bii nʉnʉa waaupo.
41005027	To biri Jesús yee maquẽre queti tʉori, bojoca watoapʉ cʉ̃ jiro pee waari, cʉ̃ jutirore padeñaupo,
41005028	“Cʉ̃ jutirore yʉ ca padeña eyorije mena wadora, yʉ diarique ametʉarucu,” ĩi tʉgoeñari, to biro tiiupo.
41005029	Cʉ̃ jutirore cõ ca padeñarije menara, ca díi waarije tatiupe. To cõrora cõ upʉri diarique manigo cõ ca tuarijere tʉgoeña majiupo.
41005030	Jesús pee cãa, cʉ̃ ca tʉgoeña tutuarije to ca witi ũmaa waaro tʉgoeña majiri, bojoca peere amojode ĩa: —¿Ñiru yʉ jutirore cʉ̃ padeñajãri? —ĩi jãiñaupi.
41005031	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro tʉori, cʉ̃ buerã pea o biro ĩiupa: —¿Paʉ bojoca ʉta bijaroacã cʉ̃ja ca tuumicõa nʉnʉa dooro ĩa pacagʉ, “¿Noa yʉre cʉ̃ja padeñati?” mʉ ĩiti? —ĩiupa.
41005032	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩi pacaro, Jesús pea cʉ̃ weja ca niirãre ĩacã niiupi, “¿Noa peti cʉ̃ja padeñabujapari?” ĩigʉ.
41005033	To cõrora cõ pea, bʉaro uwi nanarique mena cõre ca biiriquere majiri, cʉ̃ pʉto waa, ãjʉro jupea mena ea nuu waari, cõre ca biiriquere díámacʉ̃ cʉ̃re wede peoticãupo.
41005034	Jesús pea o biro cõre ĩiupi: —Macõ, “Jesús yʉre catiocãrucumi,” mʉ ca ĩi tʉgoeña bayirijera mʉ diariquere ametʉene. Mee, diarique manigopʉ tʉgoeñarique paitigora tua waagoja —ĩiupi.
41005035	Ména Jesús cʉ̃ ca wede niirora eaupa jĩcãrã nea poo juu buerica wii wiogʉ yaa wii macãrã, wimago pacʉre: —Mee, mʉ macõ bii yaicoajãwo. Ñee tiigʉ cõro ca buegʉre bʉaro mʉ pato wãcõticu —cʉ̃re ĩirã earã.
41005036	Jesús pea to biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩirijere tʉo nʉnʉjeetigʉra, o biro ĩiupi nea poo juu buerica wii wiogʉre: —Uwieto. Díámacʉ̃ra tʉo nʉnʉjeecãña —cʉ̃re ĩiupi.
41005037	To biro ĩi, Pedro, Santiago, cʉ̃ bai Juan, cʉ̃ja wadore bapa cʉti waarique booupi.
41005038	Nea poo juu buerica wii wiogʉ yaa wiipʉ ea waarã, bojoca cʉ̃ja ca oti acaro bui niiro
41005039	jãa eari, o biro cʉ̃jare ĩiupi Jesús: —¿Ñee tiirã to biirije peti mʉja acaro bui oti yugui niiti? Wãmo bii yaigo méé biimo. Cãnigo tiimo —ĩiupi.
41005040	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, bojoca pea boca buicãupa. Jesús pea too ca niirã niipetirãre witi waa dotiri, cõ pacʉ, cõ paco, to biri cʉ̃ ca bapa cʉti waaricarã mena wado wãmo cõ ca niiropʉre jãa waaupi.
41005041	Jãa ea, cõ amore ñeeri, o biro cõre ĩiupi: —Talita cumi. (“ ‘¡Wimago, wãmʉ nʉcãña!’ mʉre yʉ ĩi,” ca ĩiri wãmere). cn01713B.tif 
 “Wimago, wãmʉ nʉcãña,” mʉre yʉ ĩi. Mc 5.40
41005042	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro jiroacãra, wãmo, pʉa amo peti, dʉpore pʉaga penituaro ca niiri cʉ̃mari ca cʉogo pea, wãmʉ nʉcã, waaupo. To biro cõ ca biiro, bojoca pea ĩa ʉcʉacoa, do biro pee ĩi majiticãupa.
41005043	Jesús pea, jĩcʉ̃ ʉno peerena teere wede dotitiupi. Jiro wãmore baarique eca dotiupi.
41006001	Jesús, too ca niiricʉ witi, cʉ̃ yaa yepapʉ waacoaupi cʉ̃ buerã mena.
41006002	Yerijãarica rʉmʉ ca earo, nea poo juu buerica wiipʉ cʉ̃jare bue jʉo waaupi. Paʉ bojoca Jesús cʉ̃ ca wederijere ca tʉorã, do biro pee ĩi majiticã, o biro ameri ĩi jãiñaupa: —¿Ania noopʉ to cõro paʉ cʉ̃ buejapari? ¿Ate majirique cʉ̃ ca boca amiriquea ñee ʉno to niiti? ¿Do biro pee tiicãri, ca ĩa ñaaña manirijere to cõro cʉ̃ tii bau nii majiti?
41006003	¿Ania yucʉ pĩiri paderi majʉ José macʉ̃, ñucã María macʉ̃, Santiago, José, Judas, Simón jãari jũwʉ méé cʉ̃ niiti? ¿Cʉ̃ bairã romirira ano mani watoa cʉ̃ja niititi? —ĩiupa. To biro ca ĩirã niiri, cʉ̃ ca wederijere tʉo nʉnʉjeetiupa.
41006004	To biri Jesús pea o biro cʉ̃jare ĩiupi: —Jĩcʉ̃ ca biipere wede jʉgueri majʉre niipetiri taberipʉre cʉ̃re nʉcʉ̃ bʉoma. Cʉ̃ yaa yepa majurope macãrã, cʉ̃ yaarã ca nii cojorã, cʉ̃ yaa wii macãrã majurope pea, cʉ̃re nʉcʉ̃ bʉotima —ĩiupi.
41006005	To biri toore jĩcã wãme ʉno peera ca ĩa ñaaña manirijere tiitiupi, jĩcãrãacã ca diarique cʉtirãre cʉ̃ amori mena ñia peo, cʉ̃ ca tii catiorije ca niitirijepʉra.
41006006	Cʉ̃ pea díámacʉ̃ cʉ̃re cʉ̃ja ca tʉo nʉnʉjeetirijere ĩagʉ, “Uwiorije ca biirã cʉ̃ja niiti,” cʉ̃jare ĩi ĩaupi. To biri too pʉtori ca niiri macãri pee añurije quetire wede yujurucuupi.
41006007	Jiro Jesús, cʉ̃ buerã pʉa amo peti, dʉpore pʉaga penituaro ca niirãre jʉo cojo, wãtĩare cʉ̃ja ca cõa wiene majipere cʉ̃jare upori, pʉarãri wado cʉ̃jare tiicojo cojo jʉo waaupi.
41006008	O biro cʉ̃jare ĩi wede majioupi: —Maa waarã pʉgue cʉti waarique ʉnora, wajopoa ʉnora, baarique ʉnora, wapa tiirica tiiri ʉnora, jee waaticãña. Tuericagʉ wado ami waa waarãja.
41006009	Dʉpo jutira jãña waarãja. Bii pacarã, juti mʉja ca wajoa jãñape docare jee waaticãña.
41006010	”Ñucã, jĩcã wiire earã, tii wiira niicãña. Apero mʉja ca waari rʉmʉpʉ tii wiire witiya.
41006011	No ca boori tabe macãrã mʉjare booti, mʉja ca wederijere tʉorʉgati cʉ̃ja ca biijata, tii tabere witi waarãra, mʉja dʉporire jita ca tujarijere paa bateya, “Jãa ca wederijere mʉja ca tʉorʉgatirije jʉori mʉja yee wapa ñañaro mʉja tamʉorucu,” cʉ̃jare ĩi majiorã —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi Jesús.
41006012	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro jiro cʉ̃ buerã waari, bojocare: “Tʉgoeña yeri wajoa, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉre tʉo nʉnʉjeeya,” cʉ̃jare ĩi wede majio,
41006013	ñucã bojocapʉre ca niirã wãtĩare paʉ cõa wiene, paʉ bojoca ca diarique cʉtirãre ʉje mena wadari cʉ̃jare diarique ametʉene, tii catio yujuupa.
41006014	Wiogʉ Herodes, Jesús yee maquẽre cʉ̃ja ca wedero queti tʉoupi, cʉ̃ ca tii niirije queti niipetiri taberipʉ ca jeja nʉcã peticoarije ca niiro macã. Jĩcãrã: —Uwo Coeri majʉ Juan cati tuajapi. Tee tiigʉ ate ca ĩa ñaaña manirije tii maji tutuariquere cʉomi —ĩiupa.
41006015	Aperã: —Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yee quetire wede jʉgueri majʉ Elías niimi —ĩiupa. Aperã: —Tĩrʉmʉpʉ macãrã ca biipere wede jʉgueri maja mena macʉ̃ ʉno niimi —cʉ̃re ĩiupa.
41006016	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩirijere tʉogʉ, Herodes pea o biro ĩiupi: —Juan niicumi. Cʉ̃ dʉpʉgare yʉ ca paa taa dotiricʉ cati tuagʉ biicumi —ĩiupi.
41006017	Ména Herodes pea, Herodías jʉori Juan're ñee dotiri, tia cũurica wiipʉ come daari mena cʉ̃re jia cũu dotiupi. Herodías pea, wiogʉ Herodes bai Felipe nʉmo niimiupo. Cõrena cʉ̃re ẽmari, nʉmo cʉtiupi Herodes.
41006018	To biro cʉ̃ ca tiiro Juan pea: Doti cũurique mʉ bai nʉmorena nʉmo cʉti dotiti —cʉ̃re ĩiupi.
41006019	Tee jʉori Herodías, Juan're bʉaro ĩa tuti, cʉ̃re jĩarʉga coterucuupo. Bii pacago, do biro tii majitiupo.
41006020	Herodes'pʉra Juan're uwi, añuro cʉ̃re ĩa coteupi, ca bojoca añugʉ, ca ñañarije manigʉ cʉ̃ ca niirijere majiri. Herodes, Juan cʉ̃ ca wederijere tʉogʉ, do biro ĩi majiticãrucuupi. To biro bii pacagʉ añuro cʉ̃re tʉorucuupi.
41006021	Biirique peti, Herodías peera cõ ca tiirʉga coterucurique cõ ca tiipa rʉmʉ ea bojaupa. Herodes, cʉ̃ ca baʉarica rʉmʉ ca earo, cʉ̃ mena macãrã wiorã, uwamarã ʉparãre, Galilea yepa macãrã ʉparã ca nii majuropeerãre jʉo nea poori, cʉ̃ja mena baa, boje rʉmʉ tii niiupi.
41006022	Herodías macõ pea Herodes cʉ̃ mena macãrã ʉparã niipetirã mena cʉ̃ ca baa boje rʉmʉ tii niiri tabepʉ jãa waari, bajaupo. Cõ ca bajarijere Herodes, ñucã cʉ̃ mena ca baa bapa cʉti duwirã cãa, bʉaro peti ĩa ʉjea niiupa. To biri Herodes pea o biro cõre ĩiupi: —No mʉ ca boorije yʉre jãiña. Mʉre yʉ tiicojorucu —ĩiupi.
41006023	To biro cõre ĩicãri, jĩcãti méé, “Yee méé mʉre yʉ ĩi. No ca boori wãme mʉ ca jãirijere mʉre yʉ tiicojo majuropeecãrucu. Yʉ ca doti niiri yepa cãare decomacã mena yʉ tiicojo maji,” cõre ĩiupi Herodes.
41006024	To biro cõre cʉ̃ ca ĩiro: —¿Ñee ʉno cʉ̃re yʉ jãigoti? —ĩi jãiñago witi waaupo cõ pacore. To biro cõ ca ĩiro, cõ paco pea: —Uwo Coeri majʉ Juan dʉpʉgare jãiña —ĩi yʉʉupo.
41006025	To biro cõ ca ĩiro, uwaro wiogʉ pʉtopʉ jãa waa, o biro cʉ̃re ĩiupo: —Mecʉ̃acãra mee, Uwo Coeri majʉ Juan dʉpʉgare jotʉ bapapʉ jãari, yʉre mʉ ca tiicojoro yʉ boo —cʉ̃re ĩiupo.
41006026	To biro cʉ̃re cõ ca ĩirijere tʉogʉ, Herodes pea bʉaro tʉgoeñarique paiupi. To biro bii pacagʉ, paʉ cʉ̃ ca jʉo cojoricarã cʉ̃ja ca tʉo cojoro, “Yʉre mʉ ca jãirijere mʉre yʉ tiicojo majuropeecãrucu” cʉ̃ ca ĩicãrique ca niiro macã, cõ ca jãirijere, “Yʉ tiicojoti” cõre ĩi majitiupi Herodes.
41006027	To biri to biiro cõ ca ĩiro jiroacãra mee, jĩcʉ̃ uwãmʉre Juan dʉpʉgare paa taa ami doo dotiupi. Uwamʉ pea Juan're cʉ̃ja ca tia cũurica wiipʉ waari, cʉ̃ dʉpʉgare paa taa ami,
41006028	jotʉ bapapʉ ami jãa, ami waari tiicojoupi Juan dʉpʉgare ca jãiricopʉre. Cõ pea ñucã cõ pacopʉre tiicojo ametʉeneupo.
41006029	Juan're to biro cʉ̃ja ca tii cõariquere queti tʉori, cʉ̃ buerã pea doo, cʉ̃ upʉri niiquĩriquere ami, yaarã waaupa.
41006030	Jiro Jesús buerã tua earã, cʉ̃ mena nea poo, niipetirije cʉ̃ja ca tiiriquere, cʉ̃ja ca bue yujuriquere, cʉ̃re wedeupa.
41006031	Cʉ̃re cʉ̃ja ca wede yapanoro: —Dooya. Jamʉ, ca bojoca maniropʉ mani wado mani yerijãaco petopʉra —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi. Paʉ bojoca waacoarucu, doocã doorucu, biirã, do biro tii baa yeri puna jãña majiña maniro cʉ̃jare biiupa.
41006032	To biri Jesús cʉ̃ buerã mena cũmuapʉ ea jãa waacoaupa, ca bojoca maniropʉ waarã.
41006033	Toopʉ cʉ̃ja ca waaro, paʉ bojoca cʉ̃jare ca ĩaricarã majicãupa. To biri niipetiri macãri macãrã maapʉ cʉ̃ja jʉguero, cʉ̃ja ca tĩa ea waaparopʉre ũmaa eacoaupa.
41006034	Jesús tĩa ea, maa nʉcãgʉ paʉ bojocare ĩa, bʉaro cʉ̃jare ĩa boo pacaupi, oveja cʉ̃jare ca cotegʉ manirãre biro cʉ̃ja ca biiro macã. Jesús pea paʉ wãmeri cʉ̃jare bue jʉo waaupi.
41006035	Ca naio doori tabe ca niiro, cʉ̃ buerã pea cʉ̃ pʉto pee doo, o biro cʉ̃re ĩiupa: —Naio waaropʉ bii. Ca bojoca maniropʉ nii anoa.
41006036	Bojocare, “Tua waarãja,” cʉ̃jare ĩiña. Ano pʉtori ca niiri macãripʉ waari, baarique cʉ̃ja wapa tii baarã waajato —cʉ̃re ĩiupa.
41006037	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro tʉo: —Mʉjara cʉ̃jare baarique ecaya —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi Jesús. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, o biro cʉ̃re ĩi yʉʉupa: —¿To docare doscientos rʉmʉri pade wapa taaricaro cõro mena cʉ̃jare ecarʉgarã jãa ca baarique wapa tiirã waaro mʉ booti? —ĩiupa.
41006038	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro: —Ĩa ñaarãja. ¿No cõro paʉ pan mʉja cʉoti? —ĩiupi. Ĩaña yapano: —Pan jĩcã amo cõro niiri caari, wai pʉarã, to cõrora jãa cʉo —cʉ̃re ĩiupa.
41006039	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro Jesús pea, “Bojocare, upa poogaari taa yepapʉ duwi dotiya,” ĩiupi cʉ̃ buerãre.
41006040	To biri cʉ̃ja pea cien, ñucã aperãre cincuenta ca niirã duwi dotiupa.
41006041	Cʉ̃ja ca duwi doti yapanoro jiro, Jesús pea jĩcã amo cõro ca niirije pan're, wai pʉarã ca niirãre ami, emʉaropʉ ĩa mʉene, “Añurije to niijato” ĩi juu bue peo yapano, pan're pee bato, cʉ̃ buerãre tiicojoupi, bojocare cʉ̃ja bato cojojato ĩigʉ. Ñucã wai pʉarã ca niiricarã cãare, cʉ̃ja niipetirãpʉrena bato peoticã cojoupi.
41006042	To biro cʉ̃ ca tiirijere, niipetirãpʉra baa yapicoaupa.
41006043	Cʉ̃ buerã pea ñucã cʉ̃ja ca baa dʉarije pan're, wai menare, pʉa amo peti, dʉpore pʉaga penituaro niiri pijeeri peti jee jãa dadoupa.
41006044	Atere ca baaricarã pea jĩcã amo cõro mil peti ʉmʉa niiupa.
41006045	Tee jiro Jesús bojocare cʉ̃ ca waarique wui ditoye, cʉ̃ buerã Betsaida macã ca niiri tabe pee cʉ̃ja waa yuejato ĩigʉ, cũmuapʉ cʉ̃jare ea jãa dotiupi.
41006046	Bojocare waarique wui yapano, ʉ̃tãgʉ pee juu buegʉ waacoaupi.
41006047	Ca naio ñaacũmuri tabe ca niiro, cʉ̃ buerã pea mee ʉtabʉcʉra decomacãpʉ tʉjacã tĩa waaupa. Jesús pea ména toopʉra niicãupi.
41006048	Ca boe doori tabere cʉ̃ buerã, wino ca paa puu tuenero macã tutuaro ca waa tʉ̃a pua pajarãre ĩaupi. To biro cʉ̃ja ca bii paja yujuro, Jesús pea cʉ̃ja pʉto pee oco jotoara waacã nʉnʉa waaupi. Cʉ̃jare ametʉacoagʉ doogʉ cʉ̃ ca biirora,
41006049	cʉ̃ buerã pea oco jotoa cʉ̃ ca dooro ĩarã, “Wãtĩ niicumi” ĩirã, acaro buicoaupa,
41006050	cʉ̃ja ca ĩarijere bʉaro uwima ĩirã. To cõrora Jesús pea, o biro ĩi cojoupi: —Tʉgoeña bayiya. Yʉra yʉ nii. Uwiticãña —ĩiupi.
41006051	To biro cʉ̃jare ĩi, doo, cʉ̃ja pʉto cũmuapʉ cʉ̃ ca ea jãarora, wino ca paa puurique yerijãacoaupe. Cʉ̃ja pea bʉaropʉra ĩa ʉcʉa yaicoa, do biro pee ĩi majiticãupa,
41006052	cʉ̃ja ca tʉo maji niirijepʉre ca boe taatiro macã, pan mena cʉ̃ ca tiiriquere ca tʉo puotiricãrã niiri.
41006053	Ʉtabʉcʉrare tĩa ea waarã, Genesaret yepare ea, too maaupa.
41006054	Cʉ̃ja ca maa nʉcãrije menara, bojoca pea Jesús're ĩa majicãupa.
41006055	To biri jĩcãto tii yepa niipetiropʉ waari, “Jesús toopʉ niimi,” cʉ̃ja ca ĩirijere tʉorã, cʉ̃ ca niiri tabepʉra ca diarique cʉtirãre cʉ̃ja ca pejari taberi menara jee waaupa.
41006056	Jesús, õcã macãriacã, paca macãri, macã manirori cʉ̃ ca waari taberi cõro cʉ̃ja yaarã ca diarique cʉtirãre, wije caari watoa macã maaripʉ cʉ̃jare cʉ̃re cũu yueri, “Petopʉra mʉ jutiro yapaacã cʉ̃jare padeña dotiya,” cʉ̃re ĩiupa Jesús're. Niipetirã cʉ̃ jutirore ca padeñarã cõrora, cati peticoarucuupa.
41007001	Jiro fariseos, jĩcãrã doti cũuriquere jʉo bueri maja Jerusalén'pʉ ca dooricarã mena, Jesús pʉto eaupa.
41007002	Cʉ̃ja pea, Jesús buerã jĩcãrã, cʉ̃ja ca tii jʉo dooriquere biro tiitirãra, amo coeri méé cʉ̃ja ca baaro ĩari cʉ̃jare wede paiupa.
41007003	Fariseos, to biri niipetirã judíos ca nii cojorã, cʉ̃ja ñicʉ̃ jʉ̃mʉa cʉ̃ja ca tii jʉo dooricarore biro tiirã, amo coetirãra baa, tiitima.
41007004	Ñucã apeye ca wapa tiirã waaricarã tua earã cãa, cʉ̃ja amorire coetirãra baa, tiitima. Apeye to biro cʉ̃ja ca tiirique cʉtiri wãmerire, paʉ cʉoupa cʉ̃ja ñicʉ̃ jʉ̃mʉapʉ cʉ̃ja ca tii jʉo dooriquere, jotʉ bapari coerique, pio jãaricarʉʉrire coeriquere, come baparire coeriquere, duwirica quejerire coerique ʉnore tiima.
41007005	To biri fariseos, doti cũuriquere jʉo bueri maja, o biro ĩi jãiñaupa Jesús're: —¿Ñee tiirã mʉ buerã pea mani ñicʉ̃ jʉ̃mʉa cʉ̃ja ca tii jʉo dooriquere tiitirãra, amo coeri méé cʉ̃ja baati? —ĩi jãiñaupa.
41007006	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, Jesús pea o biro cʉ̃jare ĩi yʉʉupi: —Yee mééra ĩiquĩjapi Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ yeere wede jʉgueri majʉ Isaías, mʉja, watoara ca bii dito pairãre ĩigʉ o biro cʉ̃ ca ĩi owaquĩriquera: “Anija, ʉjero ĩirique wado yʉre ĩi nʉcʉ̃ bʉoma; cʉ̃ja yeri pea aperopʉ niicã.
41007007	Watoa petira yʉre ĩi nʉcʉ̃ bʉocãma; cʉ̃ja ca bue majiorijea, bojocara cʉ̃ja ca tii dotirije nii,” cʉ̃ ca ĩiquĩriquera.
41007008	“Mʉja, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ cʉ̃ ca doti cũuriquere tiitirãra, mʉja ñicʉ̃ jʉ̃mʉa cʉ̃ja ca tii jʉo doorique peere mʉja tii nʉnʉjee,” cʉ̃jare ĩiupi.
41007009	O biro ĩi nemoupi ñucã: —Mʉja, jãa ñicʉ̃ jʉ̃mʉa cʉ̃ja ca tii jʉo doorique yai nʉcãre ĩirã, tee peere tii nʉnʉjeema ĩirã, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ cʉ̃ ca doti cũurique peera, “To biro biicu” mʉja ĩiti.
41007010	Moisés o biro ĩiupi: “Mʉ pacʉre, mʉ pacore nʉcʉ̃ bʉoya. Cʉ̃ pacʉre, cʉ̃ pacore ñañaro ca ĩi tutigʉa, ca jĩa cõa ecopʉ niirucumi,” ĩiupi.
41007011	Mʉja pea: Jĩcʉ̃, cʉ̃ pacʉre, cʉ̃ pacore, “ ‘Mʉjare yʉ ca tii nemoboriquere, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉre yʉ ca tiicojoriquepʉ wado nii, to biri mʉjare yʉ noni majiti,’ ĩicã majimi,” mʉja ĩi bue majio.
41007012	Ñucã to biirije ca ĩigʉa, “ ‘Mʉ pacʉre, mʉ pacore tii nemoña,’ ca ĩi ecopʉ méé niimi,” mʉja ĩi.
41007013	Ate mʉja ñicʉ̃ jʉ̃mʉa cʉ̃ja ca tii jʉo doorique pee wadore ameri wede majio, tii nʉnʉa waama ĩirã, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ wederique peera ca wapa manirije ca tuaro mʉja tii. Ñucã apeye tee ʉnore paʉ mʉja tiicã —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi Jesús.
41007014	To biro cʉ̃jare ĩi, bojocare jʉo cojo, o biro ĩiupi: —Niipetirã yʉre tʉori, atere añuro tʉo puoya.
41007015	Baariquea, jĩcã wãme ʉno peera bojocare ñañoti. Bojoca, yeripʉ ñañarije tʉgoeñari cʉ̃ja ca ĩirije doca bojocare ñaño.
41007016	Ca amoperi cʉtigʉa tʉoya yʉ ca ĩirijere —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi.
41007017	Jiro Jesús bojocare camotati, waa, wiipʉ cʉ̃ ca earo, cʉ̃ buerã pea cʉ̃ ca ĩi cõoña wederique maquẽre cʉ̃re jãiñaupa.
41007018	Cʉ̃ja ca jãiñaro, Jesús pea o biro ĩiupi: —¿Mʉja cãa mena to birora mʉja tʉo jeeñoticãti? ¿Baarique jĩcã wãme ʉno peera bojocare ca ñañotirijere mʉja majititi?
41007019	Baariquea yeripʉ waati. Ʉtapoa pee waa, jiro witi batecoa —ĩiupi. Atere o biro ĩigʉ: “Niipetirije baarique añurije wado nii,” ĩigʉ ĩiupi Jesús.
41007020	O biro ĩi nemoupi ñucã: —Ñañarije tʉgoeñacãri wede wienerique pee doca, bojocare ca ñañorije nii.
41007021	Bojoca yeripʉ, ñañarije tʉgoeñarique, tiirica wãme cõro méépʉ ñee epericarã cʉti yai waarique, jee dutirique, jĩarique,
41007022	manʉ cʉti, nʉmo cʉti bii pacarã epericarã cʉtirique, pairo apeye cʉorʉgarique, ñañarije tiirʉga tʉgoeñarique, watoara ĩirique, bobo tʉgoeñaricaro maniro tii yai waarique, ĩa tutirique, queti pairique, ca nii majuropeegʉre biro tʉgoeñarique, noo ca booro bii nucũ yujurique, nii.
41007023	Ate niipetirije ñañarije bojoca cʉ̃ja yeripʉ cʉ̃ja ca tʉgoeñarije witima ĩiro, bojocare ñaño —ĩiupi Jesús.
41007024	To ca niiricʉ Jesús Tiro, Sidón yepari pee waacoaupi. Toopʉ ea, bojoca cʉ̃ja ca majiro bootigʉ jĩcã wiipʉ jãa waaupi. Bii pacagʉ, do biro pee bii, duti majitiupi.
41007025	Mee yoari mééra, jĩcõ nomio, ca wãtĩ jãa ecorico paco Jesús cʉ̃ ca earijere queti tʉocãupo. Teere tʉori waa, cʉ̃ pʉto muu bia ea nuu waaupo.
41007026	Cõ pea judío bojoco méé, Sirofenicia macõpʉ niiupo. Ape majopʉ nii pacago, Jesús're, “Yʉ macõpʉre wãtĩ ca jãñagʉre cõa wiene bojaya,” cʉ̃re ĩiupo.
41007027	To biro cõ ca ĩiro, Jesús pea o biro cõre ĩi yʉʉupʉ: —Níjá. Ména cʉ̃ puna majurope pee cʉ̃ja baa jʉojato ĩiña. Cʉ̃ puna baariquerena ẽmari yaia peere ecajata, añuti —cõre ĩiupi.
41007028	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro: —Ʉ̃gjá Wiogʉ. To birora bii. To ca bii pacaro, cʉ̃ puna cʉ̃ja ca baa baterije yepapʉ ca ñaarijere yaia cãa baama —cʉ̃re ĩiupo.
41007029	To biro cõ ca ĩiro, Jesús pea o biro cõre ĩiupi: —To biirije yʉre mʉ ca ĩi yʉʉrije jʉori, tʉgoeñarique paitigora tua waagoja. Mee, wãtĩ mʉ macõpʉre ca niimiricʉ witicoami —ĩiupi.
41007030	Cõ pea, cõ yaa wiipʉ eago, cõ macõ cãni pejarica tabepʉ cõ ca pejaro bʉa eaupo. Cõpʉre ca niiricʉ wãtĩ pea witicoaupi mee.
41007031	Jesús, Tiro yepa ca niiricʉ waagʉ, Sidón yepare ametʉa, waa nʉnʉa waa, Galilea ʉtabʉcʉrare Decápolis ca niiri yepare eaupi.
41007032	Toopʉ cʉ̃ ca earo, jĩcʉ̃ tʉoti, wedeti, ca biigʉre ami waari, “Mʉ amori mena cʉ̃re ñia peoya,” ĩiupa Jesús're.
41007033	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro Jesús pea, apero ca bojoca maniro pee cʉ̃re ami waa, cʉ̃ amo jũari mena cʉ̃ amoperire juu jõene, ʉjeco mena cʉ̃ ñemerore padeña, tiiupi.
41007034	Jiro, emʉaro pee ĩa mʉene, yeri jini jãa, o biro cʉ̃re ĩiupi: “¡Efata!” ĩiupi. (“¡Tujuya!” ĩirʉgaro ĩi).
41007035	To biro Jesús cʉ̃ ca ĩirora, jĩcãto cʉ̃ amoperi tujucoa, cʉ̃ ñemero cãa abacoa, añuro wede majicoaupi.
41007036	Jesús pea, “Jĩcʉ̃ ʉno peerena wedeticãña,” cʉ̃re ĩiupi. Bʉaro jañuro, “Wedeticãña,” cʉ̃ ca ĩirora, bʉaro jañuro wede bato nʉnʉa waaupa.
41007037	Bojoca pea ĩa ʉcʉacoa, do biro pee ĩi majiti, o biro ĩiupa: “Niipetirijepʉrena añuro wado tiicãmi. Ca tʉotirãpʉ cãa tʉocoa, ca wedetirãpʉ cãa wedecoa, cʉ̃ja ca biiro tiimi,” ĩiupa.
41008001	Tii rʉmʉrire ñucã paʉ bojoca nea pooupa. Baarique cʉori méé cʉ̃ja ca biiro ĩari cʉ̃ buerãre jʉo cojo, o biro ĩiupi Jesús:
41008002	—Anija bojocare yʉ ĩa boo pacacoa. Mee, itia rʉmʉ peti yʉ mena niicoama; baarique ʉnora cʉotima.
41008003	Baari méé ca biirãrena, cʉ̃ja yaa wiijeripʉ yʉ ca tuenecojojata, maa decomacãrira dia ñaacoabocuma. Jĩcãrã yoaroripʉ ca dooricarã niima —ĩiupi.
41008004	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, cʉ̃ buerã pea o biro ĩi yʉʉupa: —¿Ano ʉno ca bojoca maniropʉre noopʉ baarique bʉacãri, ecarique niicu mʉ ĩiti? —ĩiupa.
41008005	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, Jesús pea: —¿No cãnacãga pan mʉja cʉoti? —cʉ̃jare ĩi jãiñaupi. Cʉ̃ja pea: —Jĩcã amo peti, ape amore pʉaga penituaro niiri caari jãa cʉo —cʉ̃re ĩiupa.
41008006	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, bojocare yepapʉ duwi doti, jĩcã amo peti, ape amore pʉaga penituaro ca niirije pan're ami, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉre, “Añu majuropeecã” ĩi juu bue yapano, teere pee bato, cʉ̃ buerãre noni cojoupi bojocapʉre cʉ̃ja bato cojojato ĩigʉ. Cʉ̃ja pea to birora tiiupa.
41008007	Wai cãare no cãnacãrã meeacãra cʉoupa. Jesús pea cʉ̃jare ami, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉre, “Añu majuropeecã” ĩi, cʉ̃ja cãare cʉ̃ buerãre bato dotiupi.
41008008	To biro cʉ̃ ca tiirijere, niipetirãpʉra baa yapicoaupa. Cʉ̃ buerã pea ñucã ca dʉjarijere jĩcã amo peti, ape amore pʉaga penituaro niiri pijeeri jee jãa dadoupa.
41008009	Teere ca baaricarã pea bapari mil peti niiupa. Jiro Jesús bojocare waarique wui,
41008010	cʉ̃ buerã mena cũmuapʉ ea jãa, Dalmanuta yepa pee waacoaupi.
41008011	Jiro fariseos Jesús pʉto eari, cʉ̃ mena bʉaro wede peni jʉo waaupa. Ñañarije cʉ̃ tii bui cʉtijato ĩirã, jĩcã wãme ʉmʉreco tutipʉ maquẽ ca ĩa ñaaña manirije cʉ̃re tii bau nii dotiupa, “¿Díámacʉ̃ra Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ cʉ̃ ca tiicojoricʉra cʉ̃ niiti?” ĩi majirʉgarã.
41008012	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro, Jesús pea yeri jini jãa, o biro ĩiupi: —¿Ñee tiirã anija bojoca jĩcã wãme ca ĩa ñaaña manirije tii bau niiriquere cʉ̃ja jãiti? Yee méé yʉ ĩi. Jĩcã wãme ʉnoacã peera tii bau nii ĩñoña manirucuma —ĩiupi.
41008013	To biro cʉ̃jare ĩi, cũmuapʉ ea jãa, ʉtabʉcʉra ape nʉña pee tĩacoaupi.
41008014	To waarã, cʉ̃ buerã pea baarique jeeri méé acobo, waacoaupa. Cũmuapʉre jĩcãgaacãra pan'ga cʉoupa.
41008015	Jesús pea o biro cʉ̃jare ĩi majioupi: —Mʉja tʉgoeña majiwa, fariseos, to biri Herodes, cʉ̃ja ca tii niirije menare —ĩiupi.
41008016	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, cʉ̃ buerã pea: “Agó nija, pan mani cʉoti,” ameri ĩi niiupa.
41008017	Jesús pea to biro cʉ̃ja ca ameri ĩirijere majiri, o biro cʉ̃jare ĩiupi: —¿Ñee tiirã, “Pan mani cʉoti,” mʉja ĩiti? ¿Ména, ĩa jeeñoti, tʉo puoti mʉja biicãti? ¿Mʉja ca tʉgoeñarije to pãati majuropeecãti?
41008018	¿Cape cʉti pacarã ĩati, amoperi cʉti pacarã tʉoti, mʉja biicãti? ¿Yoari méé mʉja acobocoati?
41008019	Jĩcã amo cõro niirije pan menara jĩcã amo cõro mil ca niirãre yʉ ca baarique batorique ca dʉjarijere ¿no cãnacã pijeeri peti mʉja jee jãa dadori? —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro cʉ̃ja pea: —Pʉa amo peti, dʉpore pʉaga penituaro niiri pijeeri —ĩiupa.
41008020	—Ñucã, jĩcã amo peti, ape amore pʉaga penituaro ca niirije pan menara, bapari mil ca niirãre yʉ ca baarique batorica tabera, ¿no cãnacã pijeeri mʉja jee jãa dadori? —ĩiupi. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro: —Jĩcã amo peti, ape amore pʉaga penituaro niiri pijeeri —ĩiupa.
41008021	—¿To docare ména, mʉja tʉo puoticãti? —ĩiupi Jesús, cʉ̃ buerãre.
41008022	Jiro Betsaida cʉ̃ja ca earo, jĩcãrã jĩcʉ̃ ca ĩatigʉre Jesús pʉto ami waari, “Cʉ̃re padeñaña,” ĩiupa Jesús're.
41008023	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro Jesús pea, ca ĩatigʉre macã tʉjaropʉ cʉ̃re tʉ̃acã witi waaupi. Toopʉ cʉ̃ ʉjeco mena cʉ̃ capere weyo, cʉ̃ amori mena cʉ̃ capere ñia peo, “¿Mee apeye ʉno mʉ ĩati?” cʉ̃re ĩi jãiñaupi.
41008024	To biro cʉ̃ ca tiiro, ca ĩatimiricʉ pea ĩa pãari, o biro cʉ̃re ĩiupi: —Bojocare yʉ ĩa biigʉpʉa. Bʉari, yucʉra waa yujurore biro biicã —cʉ̃re ĩiupi.
41008025	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, Jesús pea cʉ̃ capere ñia peo nemoupi ñucã. To biro cʉ̃ ca tiiro, ñee jãa maniro añuro ĩa, diarique manigʉpʉ tuacãupi yua.
41008026	To cõrora Jesús pea cʉ̃ yaa wiipʉ cʉ̃re tuenecojogʉ, o biro cʉ̃re ĩiupi: —Macã pee piya waari, jĩcʉ̃ ʉno peerena wedegʉ waa, tiiticãña —ĩiupi.
41008027	Ate jiro Jesús cʉ̃ buerã mena, Cesarea de Filipo yepa macã macãripʉ waaupi. Maapʉ waa nʉnʉa waagʉ, Jesús cʉ̃ buerãre: —¿Bojoca, ‘Ñiru niimi,’ yʉre cʉ̃ja ĩirucuti? —cʉ̃jare ĩi jãiñaupi.
41008028	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩi jãiñaro: —Jĩcãrã: “Uwo Coeri majʉ Juan niimi.” Aperã: “Elías niimi.” Aperã: “Jĩcʉ̃ ca biipere wede jʉgueri maja mena macʉ̃ niimi,” mʉre ĩima —cʉ̃re ĩi yʉʉupa.
41008029	To biro cʉ̃ja ca ĩiro: —Mʉja pea, ¿“Ñiru niimi,” yʉre mʉja ĩiti? —cʉ̃jare ĩi jãiñaupi Jesús. To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, Simón Pedro pea: —Mʉa, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ cʉ̃ ca tiicojo cojoricʉ Cristo mʉ nii —cʉ̃re ĩiupi.
41008030	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro: “Teere jĩcʉ̃ ʉno peerena wedeticãña,” ĩiupi Jesús cʉ̃ buerãre.
41008031	Jiro Jesús cʉ̃ buerãre o biro cʉ̃jare ĩi wede majio jʉo waaupi: —Yʉ, Ca Nii Majuropeegʉ Macʉ̃, bʉaropʉra ñañaro tamʉo, judíos're ca jʉo niirãre, paia ʉparãre, doti cũuriquere ca jʉo buerãre ĩa juna eco, yʉ ca biipera niiro bii. Ñucã yʉre jĩa cõa, cʉ̃ja ca tii pacaro itia rʉmʉ jiro yʉ cati tuacoarucu —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi.
41008032	Atere tʉo majiricarora cʉ̃jare wede majioupi. To cõrora Pedro pea, apero pee cʉ̃re ami waa, to biro cʉ̃ ca ĩirije jʉori cʉ̃re tuti camota jʉo waaupi.
41008033	To biro cʉ̃ ca ĩiro, Jesús pea amojode nʉcã, cʉ̃ buerãre ĩari, o biro ĩi tutiupi Pedrore: —¡Yʉre camotati waagʉja Satanás! Mʉa Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ cʉ̃ ca tiirʉgari wãmere mʉ majiti. Bojoca cʉ̃ja ca tʉgoeñarore birora mʉ tʉgoeñacã —cʉ̃re ĩiupi.
41008034	To biro cʉ̃re ĩi, cʉ̃ buerãre bojocare jʉo cojori, o biro ĩiupi Jesús: —Jĩcʉ̃ yʉ buegʉ ca niirʉgʉ ʉnoa mʉ majurope mʉ ca tiirʉgarijere acobori, yʉ yee jʉori ñañaro tamʉo pacagʉ, to birora tʉgoeña bayi, yʉre nʉnʉña.
41008035	Cʉ̃ ca cati niirijere ca maigʉa, cʉ̃ ca catipere bʉatirucumi. To ca bii pacaro yʉ yee jʉori, añurije quetire cʉ̃ ca tʉo nʉnʉjeerije jʉori, ñañaro ca tii eco yaigʉa, ametʉarucumi.
41008036	¿Ñee ʉno peere to tii nemoti ati yepa maquẽ niipetirore pairo cʉo ametʉenecã pacagʉ, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉre tʉo nʉnʉjeetigʉra ca bii yaigʉra?
41008037	Ñucã, ¿no cõro pairo mena cʉ̃ wapa tiibogajati, cʉ̃ ca cati niipe wapare?
41008038	Ati cuu macãrã ñañarije tii, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉre tʉo nʉnʉjeeti, ca biirã watoare niirã, yʉ yee quetire, yʉ yee maquẽre bobo jãa, ca biirãra, yʉ, Ca Nii Majuropeegʉ Macʉ̃ cãa, yʉ Pacʉ cʉ̃ ca boe baterije, cʉ̃ pʉto macãrã ca ñañarije manirã mena yʉ ca doori rʉmʉre, yʉ yee quetire wederʉgarã cʉ̃ja ca bobo jãaricarore birora cʉ̃jare yʉ bobo ĩarucu —cʉ̃jare ĩiupi Jesús.
41009001	O biro ĩi nemoupi ñucã: —Yee méé mʉjare yʉ ĩi: Jĩcãrã ano ca niirã mena macãrã, Ʉmʉreco Pacʉ cʉ̃ ca doti niiri tabe, cʉ̃ ca tutuarije mena ca earo ĩatirãra bii yaitirucuma —ĩiupi.
41009002	Jĩcã amo peti, ape amore jĩcãga penituaro niiri rʉmʉri jiro, Jesús, cʉ̃ buerã Pedro, Juan, Santiago jãa wadore, ʉ̃tãgʉ ca emʉaricʉpʉ jʉo waaupi. Toopʉ, cʉ̃ja ca ĩa cojoro cʉ̃ ca baurije wajoacoaupi.
41009003	Cʉ̃ juti cãa bʉaro boti ajiyaarije biicoaupe. Jĩcʉ̃ ʉno peera bʉaro coecã pacagʉ, añuro botiritopʉ cʉ̃ ca tii majitiro ametʉeneropʉ botiupe.
41009004	Ñucã Elías, Moisés baua eari, Jesús mena wede peni niiupa.
41009005	To biro cʉ̃ja ca biiro ĩagʉ, Pedro pea o biro ĩiupi Jesús're: —Buegʉ, anopʉ mani ca niiro añu majuropeecã. Itia wii, wii pĩiri jãa quenorucu. Mʉ yaa wii, Moisés yaa wii, Elías yaa wii, jãa tiirucu —ĩiupi.
41009006	Cʉ̃ ca wederijere, “To biirije yʉ ĩicu,” ĩi majiticãupi, niipetirãpʉra ʉcʉa yaicoama ĩirã.
41009007	To biro cʉ̃ja ca bii niirora, bueri bʉrʉa doo, cʉ̃jare paa ũmaa nʉcõcãupe. To biro ca biirora bueri bʉrʉapʉ wederique o biro ca ĩirije wedeoupe: “Ania, yʉ Macʉ̃, yʉ ca maigʉ niimi. Cʉ̃re tʉo nʉnʉjeeya,” ĩiupe.
41009008	To biro ca ĩiri nimarora ĩa cojorã, Jesús jĩcʉ̃rena ĩaupa.
41009009	Ʉ̃tãgʉpʉ ca niiricarã duwi nʉnʉa doorã, Jesús pea: “Mʉja ca ĩajãrijere jĩcʉ̃ ʉno peerena wedeticãña, yʉ, Ca Nii Majuropeegʉ Macʉ̃ ca bii yairicarã watoare yʉ ca cati tuaro jiropʉ mʉja wederucu,” cʉ̃jare ĩiupi.
